original: de la brtson zhing de la rtse gcig tu 'don pa'i yid do //
analyzed: de la brtson zhing de la rtse gcig tu 'don pa'i yid do //
translated: The mind is the one that is intent on that, and is one-pointed in regard to that.

original: yid ces kha cig tu 'don to //
analyzed: yid ces kha cig tu 'don to //
translated: Some read “mind” .

original: ci ltar rdo rje chos yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar rdo rje chos yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it the vajra of Dharma?

original: rdo rje de kho na nyid de dag ci'i ngo bo yin pa de rnams ni rdo rje'i de kho na nyid can rnams te kun rnams ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje de kho na nyid de dag ci'i ngo bo yin pa de rnams ni rdo rje'i de kho na nyid can rnams te kun rnams ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: Those which have the nature of those vajra realities are the vajra realities, and all of them are form, etc.

original: rdo rje las kyang gnod bya ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir zhi ba la sogs pa'i las so //
analyzed: rdo rje las kyang gnod bya ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir zhi ba la sogs pa'i las so //
translated: And because the vajra is not to be harmed, it is the action of pacification, etc.

original: de rnams la mngon par 'gro ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: de rnams la mngon par 'gro ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because they go forth to those,

original: chos kyi dbyings ni de'i bdag nyid kyis thams cad du 'gro ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ni de'i bdag nyid kyis thams cad du 'gro ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the realm of phenomena is all-pervading by its very nature.

original: kun rdzob kyi rnam par dag pa ni rdo rje lha rnams su lhag par mos bzhin pa rnams spro bar byed pas rdo rje rnams kyi brtan par mos pa las dbyer med pa rnams kyi sems can rnams 'khor ba las sgrol ba ni tshogs kyi sar ro //
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi rnam par dag pa ni rdo rje lha rnams su lhag par mos bzhin pa rnams spro bar byed pas rdo rje rnams kyi brtan par mos pa las dbyer med pa rnams kyi sems can rnams 'khor ba las sgrol ba ni tshogs kyi sar ro //
translated: The purification of the conventional is the emanation of the vajra deities, who are intent on the vajras, who are inseparable from the firm resolve of the vajras, who liberate sentient beings from cyclic existence on the stage of the assembly.

original: gang gi phyir rdo rje ste bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa goms pas bkug pa gsal bar bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor shes rab dang thabs snyoms par 'jug pa gang rnams kyi yin pa de rnams kyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rdo rje ste bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa goms pas bkug pa gsal bar bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor shes rab dang thabs snyoms par 'jug pa gang rnams kyi yin pa de rnams kyi /
translated: Because of the vajra, i.e., the non-dual reality, which is summoned by the practice of it, the yogis who are clear in their meditation, and who are in union with the wisdom and means,

original: rdo rje bdud la sogs pa rnams kyis mi phyed pas gus pa dang bcas pa bar ma chad par yun ring du goms pas /
analyzed: rdo rje bdud la sogs pa rnams kyis mi phyed pas gus pa dang bcas pa bar ma chad par yun ring du goms pas /
translated: are not divided by the vajra-demons, etc.

original: gang rengs pa ni rnam par g-yengs ba'i 'phro ba 'gog pa ste /
analyzed: gang rengs pa ni rnam par g-yengs ba'i 'phro ba 'gog pa ste /
translated: The stiffening is the stopping of the distraction of discursiveness.

original: rnal 'byor de rig pa shin tu brtan par lhag par mos par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor de rig pa shin tu brtan par lhag par mos par 'gyur te /
translated: That yoga is the firm conviction of the yogis.

original: mos pa spyod pa'i sa la'o //
analyzed: mos pa spyod pa'i sa la'o //
translated: It is on the stage of the practice of conviction.

original: de las kyang mun pa lta bu ni gang nyon mongs pa rnams te /
analyzed: de las kyang mun pa lta bu ni gang nyon mongs pa rnams te /
translated: And from that, the darkness-like afflictions

original: de rnams la mar me lta bu rnams shes te /
analyzed: de rnams la mar me lta bu rnams shes te /
translated: are the lamps,

original: de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i phyir khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i phyir khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa'o //
translated: the special knowledge which is the realization of reality.

original: ye shes ni rdo rje dang 'bar ba @270a * //
analyzed: ye shes ni rdo rje dang 'bar ba @270a * //
translated: The knowledge is the vajra, the flame,

original: dang lhan cig ste dus mnyam par gzhom par bya'o //
analyzed: dang lhan cig ste dus mnyam par gzhom par bya'o //
translated: which is to be conquered simultaneously.

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:

original: blo ldan sems mchog bskyed ma thag tu ni //
analyzed: blo ldan sems mchog bskyed ma thag tu ni //
translated: Immediately after the wise one generates the supreme mind,

original: sems ni mtha' yas nyes byas las ldog pa'o //
analyzed: sems ni mtha' yas nyes byas las ldog pa'o //
translated: the mind turns away from limitless faults and misdeeds.

original: zhes so // mthong ba'i lam kho nar de kho na nyid mthong bas spang bya phrag brgyad cu rnams spong bar thub pa'i dgongs pa'i rgyan du gsal bar byas so //
analyzed: zhes so // mthong ba'i lam kho nar de kho na nyid mthong bas spang bya phrag brgyad cu rnams spong bar thub pa'i dgongs pa'i rgyan du gsal bar byas so //
translated: Thus, by seeing reality on the path of seeing, the Ornament of the Sage's Thought clarifies the abandonment of the eighty-four thousand discards.

original: de ltar na yang snang ba de kho na nyid mthong ba ste /
analyzed: de ltar na yang snang ba de kho na nyid mthong ba ste /
translated: In that way, the appearance is the seeing of reality.

original: de kho na phyogs so //
analyzed: de kho na phyogs so //
translated: That is the side of reality.

original: des ni lhag par rtogs pa brgyud pas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa rnam pa thams cad du rtogs par bya ba de 'thob bo //
analyzed: des ni lhag par rtogs pa brgyud pas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa rnam pa thams cad du rtogs par bya ba de 'thob bo //
translated: By that, through the continuity of realization, one attains the stage of Vajradhara, which is the realization of all aspects.

original: rdo rje ste de kho na nyid mthong ba des bsgrubs pa bsgom pa'i lam ni /
analyzed: rdo rje ste de kho na nyid mthong ba des bsgrubs pa bsgom pa'i lam ni /
translated: The path of cultivation is accomplished by that vajra, the seeing of reality.

original: thams cad ste bag chags kyi gnas skabs bag la nyal rnams la rdo rje'i bdag nyid ma lus pa 'byed pa po'o //
analyzed: thams cad ste bag chags kyi gnas skabs bag la nyal rnams la rdo rje'i bdag nyid ma lus pa 'byed pa po'o //
translated: It is all, the state of habitual tendencies, the dormant states, the one who divides the entire vajra nature.

original: sgom pa'i lam de las pha rol bla na med pa'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid de /
analyzed: sgom pa'i lam de las pha rol bla na med pa'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid de /
translated: Beyond that path of cultivation is the unsurpassed vajra nature.

original: rdo rje stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i rang bzhin byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid de rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rdo rje stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i rang bzhin byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid de rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of the vajra is emptiness and compassion, the nature of the mind of enlightenment.

original: rdo rje thar pa'i ste 'khor ba'i rgyu nyon mongs pa'i phung po'i bag chags lhag ma phra mo'i gnas skabs kyang gcod par byed pa'i rnam par grol ba'i'o //
analyzed: rdo rje thar pa'i ste 'khor ba'i rgyu nyon mongs pa'i phung po'i bag chags lhag ma phra mo'i gnas skabs kyang gcod par byed pa'i rnam par grol ba'i'o //
translated: The vajra is liberation, which cuts off even the subtle remaining traces of the aggregates of afflictions, the cause of cyclic existence.

original: 'dis ni spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'dis ni spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa ste /
translated: This is the perfection of abandonment.

original: rdo rje chos nyid kyis ni chos kyi sku rtogs pa mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chos nyid kyis ni chos kyi sku rtogs pa mtshon pa'o //
translated: The vajra is reality, which indicates the realization of the dharma body.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gnyis ka phun sum tshogs pa mthar phyin pas snying po nyid de mtha'i sa'i'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gnyis ka phun sum tshogs pa mthar phyin pas snying po nyid de mtha'i sa'i'o //
translated: Therefore, it is the essence, the stage of the end, because the perfection of both is complete.

original: de'i bdag nyid kyis de 'dzin pa'i phyir yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhes bsgrags so //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyis de 'dzin pa'i phyir yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhes bsgrags so //
translated: The Bhagavān is proclaimed to be Vajradhara because he holds that nature.

original: 'di'i dngos su ba'i thabs kyang rdo rje'o zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di'i dngos su ba'i thabs kyang rdo rje'o zhes gsungs pa /
translated: The means of directly attaining that is also the vajra, as is stated:

original: rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The vajra, etc.

original: rdo rje ni bo la'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni bo la'o //
translated: The vajra is the penis.

original: padma ni ka kko la'o //
analyzed: padma ni ka kko la'o //
translated: The lotus is the kakkola.

original: mdor bstan nas rgyas par ston pa /
analyzed: mdor bstan nas rgyas par ston pa /
translated: Having taught in brief, he teaches in detail.

original: rdo rje kun rdzob pa'i byang chub sems padma rnams su rim pas zhugs pa'i bde ba chen po nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo'i ni /
analyzed: rdo rje kun rdzob pa'i byang chub sems padma rnams su rim pas zhugs pa'i bde ba chen po nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo'i ni /
translated: The reality of the experience of the great bliss that enters the lotuses in stages in the vajra of the relative awakening mind is

original: de kho na nyid thams cad nas stong pa nyid kyis goms pa las rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid bsgrub par bya ste /
analyzed: de kho na nyid thams cad nas stong pa nyid kyis goms pa las rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid bsgrub par bya ste /
translated: the vajra holder, which is accomplished from the cultivation of all of reality by means of emptiness.

original: mkhas pa ni bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa la byang zhing mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: mkhas pa ni bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa la byang zhing mkhas pa'o //
translated: The wise one is skilled in the generation and completion stages.

original: 'di skad gsungs te las dang sbyor ba dang lhan cig skyes pa'i gtum mo rnams kyi bde ba chen po'i mtsho skyes las 'og gi mtsho skyes rnams su sbyor ba'i kun rdzob pa'i byang chub kyi sems po la ka kko la'i nang ji srid pa de bzhin nyid
analyzed: 'di skad gsungs te las dang sbyor ba dang lhan cig skyes pa'i gtum mo rnams kyi bde ba chen po'i mtsho skyes las 'og gi mtsho skyes rnams su sbyor ba'i kun rdzob pa'i byang chub kyi sems po la ka kko la'i nang ji srid pa de bzhin nyid
translated: This is what is said: The great bliss of the action, yoga, and innate caṇḍālīs is the lake-born lotus of the great bliss. The relative awakening mind that unites in the lower lake-born lotuses is the kakkola.

original: dang @270b ro gcig pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba myong ba'i rang bzhin de ma thag pa'i thabs kyi ngo bo ni rdo rje zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dang @270b ro gcig pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba myong ba'i rang bzhin de ma thag pa'i thabs kyi ngo bo ni rdo rje zhes pa'o //
translated: The innate bliss that is of the same taste as that is the nature of the experience. The essence of the immediately preceding method is the vajra.

original: de yang thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud du gsungs pa /
analyzed: de yang thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud du gsungs pa /
translated: Moreover, it is taught in the Tantra of the Secret of All:

original: tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the yoga of the two accumulations,

original: sems can kun gyi don ston pa //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi don ston pa //
translated: the meaning of all sentient beings is taught.

original: rang bzhin 'od gsal ba yi sems //
analyzed: rang bzhin 'od gsal ba yi sems //
translated: The mind, which is naturally clear light,

original: rdo rje zhes ni mngon par brjod //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes ni mngon par brjod //
translated: is called “vajra.”

original: chos rnams thams cad ma skyes pa //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad ma skyes pa //
translated: All phenomena are unborn,

original: gdod nas zhi ba nam mkha' mnyam //
analyzed: gdod nas zhi ba nam mkha' mnyam //
translated: primordially peaceful, and equal to space.

original: zhes pa'i tshig ni rab 'jug pa'ang //
analyzed: zhes pa'i tshig ni rab 'jug pa'ang //
translated: The words that engage in this

original: rdo rje dril bu zhes par bshad //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu zhes par bshad //
translated: are explained as “vajra and bell.”

original: sangs rgyas bzhi po gdan bzhugs pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bzhi po gdan bzhugs pa //
translated: The four buddhas are seated

original: rdo rje padma rnams la gnas //🔽nyams su myong ba'i rim kho nas //
analyzed: rdo rje padma rnams la gnas // nyams su myong ba'i rim kho nas //
translated: on the vajra and lotus.🔽The nature of the four joys

original: dga' ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: dga' ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid do //
translated: is the stage of experience.

original: zhes so // de ltar rdo rje'i de kho na nyid rgyas par bstan nas rdo rje phyed pas mtshan pa'i dril bu'i de kho na nyid rgyas par ston pa gsungs pa nyon zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes so // de ltar rdo rje'i de kho na nyid rgyas par bstan nas rdo rje phyed pas mtshan pa'i dril bu'i de kho na nyid rgyas par ston pa gsungs pa nyon zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Having thus extensively explained the reality of the vajra, in order to extensively explain the reality of the bell marked with a half-vajra, [the Bhagavān] declares, listen, and so on.

original: gsungs zin pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyir dang / de nyid kyi phyir sems can mgu bar byed pa'i phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa dang rgyal por khyod skyes te /
analyzed: gsungs zin pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyir dang / de nyid kyi phyir sems can mgu bar byed pa'i phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa dang rgyal por khyod skyes te /
translated: Because of being a vajra-holder as already stated, and because of pleasing sentient beings, you are born as a vajra-holder and king.

original: da ni 'di rdo rje snying po nyon cig /'dis ci bya zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni 'di rdo rje snying po nyon cig /'dis ci bya zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Now, listen to this vajra essence. What is done by this? It is stated:🔽The one who listens to the proclamation of the truth

original: shes rab ces pa la sogs pa'o //🔽shes rab kho na dkrol ba ste bsgrags pa'i de kho na nyid gang rnams kyi yin pa de rnams kyis nyan par byed de /
analyzed: shes rab ces pa la sogs pa'o // shes rab kho na dkrol ba ste bsgrags pa'i de kho na nyid gang rnams kyi yin pa de rnams kyis nyan par byed de /
translated: with the highest devotion to wisdom🔽will accomplish the desired goal

original: sgra zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: sgra zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: through hearing the sound with great joy.

original: shes rab la lhag par mos pas dkrol ba rnams kyi sgra shin tu dga' bas nyan pa las mngon par 'dod pa 'grub pa ni mtshan nyid kyi dgos pa'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab la lhag par mos pas dkrol ba rnams kyi sgra shin tu dga' bas nyan pa las mngon par 'dod pa 'grub pa ni mtshan nyid kyi dgos pa'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The one who listens to the proclamation of the truth with the highest devotion to wisdom will accomplish the desired goal through hearing the sound with great joy. This is the characteristic purpose, it is thought.

original: mtshan nyid kyang kun rdzob kyis dang don dam pas kyang ngo //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyang kun rdzob kyis dang don dam pas kyang ngo //
translated: The characteristic is also by the conventional and by the ultimate.

original: de la dang po gsungs pa gsum //
analyzed: de la dang po gsungs pa gsum //
translated: Among them, the first is stated:🔽The one who listens to the proclamation of the truth🔽with the highest devotion to wisdom

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: will accomplish the desired goal🔽through hearing the sound with great joy.

original: 'di ni dril bu'i steng du rdo rje phyed pa'i zhar las /
analyzed: 'di ni dril bu'i steng du rdo rje phyed pa'i zhar las /
translated: This is the half-vajra on the bell.

original: rdzogs pa'i rdo rje'i yang ngo //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rdo rje'i yang ngo //
translated: And the perfect vajra is also that.

original: cha gsum rnams mnyam pa gang gi ring ba nyid du yin pa de ni de skad do //
analyzed: cha gsum rnams mnyam pa gang gi ring ba nyid du yin pa de ni de skad do //
translated: That which is equal in the three parts and is long is called that.

original: 'dzin byed ni rdo rje dril bu dag gi lus so //
analyzed: 'dzin byed ni rdo rje dril bu dag gi lus so //
translated: The holder is the body of the vajra and bell.

original: gsal ba ni so so'i cha shas gsal ba'o //
analyzed: gsal ba ni so so'i cha shas gsal ba'o //
translated: The clear one is the clear individual part.

original: ra'i 'og zla ba'i steng du dkris pa'i ri mo ni ske rags te /
analyzed: ra'i 'og zla ba'i steng du dkris pa'i ri mo ni ske rags te /
translated: The line of the wrap on the moon below the ra is the girdle.

original: mu khyud ces gang ming du grags pa mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: mu khyud ces gang ming du grags pa mdzes pa'o //
translated: The one known by the name of the rim is beautiful.

original: cha ni rnam pa gsum du byas nas de'i dbus kyi cha zlum po cha shas brgyad pa mtho ba'o //
analyzed: cha ni rnam pa gsum du byas nas de'i dbus kyi cha zlum po cha shas brgyad pa mtho ba'o //
translated: Having made the part into three forms, the middle part is a circle with eight parts and is high.

original: dbus su sna tshogs pa'i phreng ba ldan pa ste /
analyzed: dbus su sna tshogs pa'i phreng ba ldan pa ste /
translated: In the middle it has a garland of various colors.

original: rin po che dang pa tra dang myu gu rnams kyis bkra ba zhes pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rin po che dang pa tra dang myu gu rnams kyis bkra ba zhes pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it has the characteristics of being variegated with jewels, patra, and sprouts, and so on.

original: autpala kha bye @271a * //
analyzed: autpala kha bye @271a * //
translated: The open lotus

original: 'dod pa ni bye bas rgyas pa'i autpala kha ma bye ba'i rnam pa can no //
analyzed: 'dod pa ni bye bas rgyas pa'i autpala kha ma bye ba'i rnam pa can no //
translated: The desire is in the form of a bud of a blue lotus, which is expanded by a hundred thousand.

original: zhi ba ni ma gdangs pa'i rdo rje'o //🔽autpala ku mu da zhes kha cig tu 'don te /
analyzed: zhi ba ni ma gdangs pa'i rdo rje'o // autpala ku mu da zhes kha cig tu 'don te /
translated: The peace is the unstruck vajra.

original: dril bu la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: dril bu la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Some recite “utpala kumuda,” which should be applied to the bell.

original: rin chen padma rnam par gnas //
analyzed: rin chen padma rnam par gnas //
translated: The jewel is situated in the lotus.

original: zhes pa 'di ni /
analyzed: zhes pa 'di ni /
translated: This is connected with

original: lha dgu la sogs rtse mo can //🔽zhes pa 'di dang 'brel lo //
analyzed: lha dgu la sogs rtse mo can // zhes pa 'di dang 'brel lo //
translated: the nine gods, etc., the peak.

original: padma'i 'og tu yang rin po che phra mo'i phreng ba'i khor yug bya'o //
analyzed: padma'i 'og tu yang rin po che phra mo'i phreng ba'i khor yug bya'o //
translated: Below the lotus, there should be a surrounding wreath of small jewels.

original: rdo rje rtse dgu pa'i de kho na nyid rgyas par ston pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: rdo rje rtse dgu pa'i de kho na nyid rgyas par ston pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: In order to teach the reality of the nine-pointed vajra extensively, it is said:

original: phyogs zhes pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: phyogs zhes pa la sogs pa /
translated: The directions, etc.

original: phyogs dang phyogs bral gyi rva brgyad rnams la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams dang / spyan ma la sogs pa rnams bsgom mo //
analyzed: phyogs dang phyogs bral gyi rva brgyad rnams la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams dang / spyan ma la sogs pa rnams bsgom mo //
translated: One should meditate on Vairochana, etc., and Lochana, etc., in the eight directions and intermediate directions.

original: rva dbus ma la sangs rgyas dgu pa mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: rva dbus ma la sangs rgyas dgu pa mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: On the central point is the ninth Buddha, Akshobhya.

original: mtha' gzhan du lha dgu rnam par dag par byed pa po nyid kyi phyir mchog rnams te /
analyzed: mtha' gzhan du lha dgu rnam par dag par byed pa po nyid kyi phyir mchog rnams te /
translated: The best, i.e., the principal ones, are the nine deities, because they are the purifiers.

original: gtso bo rnams kyi yin pa'i rtse mo de rnams shar la sogs pa'i phyogs dang phyogs bral rnams la phyag na padma la sogs pa brgyad rnams dang / dbus kyi rtse mo la rdo rje sems dpa'o zhes pa lha dgus byin gyis brlab pa ste /
analyzed: gtso bo rnams kyi yin pa'i rtse mo de rnams shar la sogs pa'i phyogs dang phyogs bral rnams la phyag na padma la sogs pa brgyad rnams dang / dbus kyi rtse mo la rdo rje sems dpa'o zhes pa lha dgus byin gyis brlab pa ste /
translated: Those nine peaks are in the east, etc., and in the intermediate directions, with eight, beginning with Padma Holder, and in the center peak, with Vajrasattva.

original: gzhan snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The other is as before.

original: thun mong gi mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: thun mong gi mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
translated: The common characteristics are stated:

original: chu srin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: chu srin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The makara-emerged, etc.

original: dbus kyi rtse mo ma gtogs pa shar la sogs pa'i rtse mo rnams chu srin kha nas byung ba rnams so //
analyzed: dbus kyi rtse mo ma gtogs pa shar la sogs pa'i rtse mo rnams chu srin kha nas byung ba rnams so //
translated: The peaks in the east, etc., except for the central peak, are makara-emerged.
