translated: The three HUMs cause one to realize the indivisibility of body, speech, and mind.

original: ho: gsum gyis chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'i sems can grol bar byed pa nyid kyis na yang dag par sad par byed do //
analyzed: ho: gsum gyis chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'i sems can grol bar byed pa nyid kyis na yang dag par sad par byed do //
translated: The three HOs cause the liberation of sentient beings of small, middling, and great capacity, and thus they awaken them.

original: dril bus sgra byed pa yang shes rab dang thabs su lhag par mos pas shes rab dang thabs kyi ngo bo nyid dang lha'i ngo bo nyid du yang gzhan rnams la bya ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: dril bus sgra byed pa yang shes rab dang thabs su lhag par mos pas shes rab dang thabs kyi ngo bo nyid dang lha'i ngo bo nyid du yang gzhan rnams la bya ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: The bell is sounded in order to cause others to understand the nature of wisdom and method, and the nature of the deity, through the imagination of wisdom and method.

original: shes rab ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The verse beginning with “wisdom” and so forth.

original: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid zla ba dang / nyi ma ldan pa'i lag pa dag gis 'gro ba rnams kyi nad de /
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid zla ba dang / nyi ma ldan pa'i lag pa dag gis 'gro ba rnams kyi nad de /
translated: With the hands endowed with the moon and sun, which are the nature of wisdom and means, the illness of migrating beings,

original: nad rnams ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams so zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nad rnams ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams so zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: which is the afflictions of passion and so forth, is removed.

original: nye bar zhi bar gyis zhes pa lhag ma'o //🔽aom badzra zhes pa la sogs pa dril bu dkrol ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: nye bar zhi bar gyis zhes pa lhag ma'o // aom badzra zhes pa la sogs pa dril bu dkrol ba'i sngags so //
translated: “Be pacified” is the remainder.🔽“Oṃ vajra” and so forth is the mantra for ringing the bell.

original: aom sarba zhes pa la sogs pa rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: aom sarba zhes pa la sogs pa rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa'i sngags so //
translated: “Oṃ sarva” and so forth is the mantra for holding the vajra and bell.

original: shes rab thabs kyis dkrol ba yis //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyis dkrol ba yis //
translated: “By ringing with wisdom and means”

original: zhes pa rgyas par ston pa shes rab ces pa la sogs pa'o //🔽byang chub @273a * //
analyzed: zhes pa rgyas par ston pa shes rab ces pa la sogs pa'o // byang chub @273a * //
translated: is explained extensively by “wisdom” and so forth.🔽“I go for refuge to the Buddha, the Blessed One,🔽who is born from the essence of the thought of awakening,

original: sems kyi ngo bos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bskyed pa'i ched du 'gro'o zhes pa 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: sems kyi ngo bos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bskyed pa'i ched du 'gro'o zhes pa 'gro ba ste /
translated: for the sake of generating the Bhagavān Buddhas.”

original: sems can gyi 'jig rten dang / sogs pas snod kyang rtogs par bya'o zhes sgra bsgrags so //
analyzed: sems can gyi 'jig rten dang / sogs pas snod kyang rtogs par bya'o zhes sgra bsgrags so //
translated: “I go” means “I go for the sake of realizing the world of sentient beings and so forth.”🔽“So it is proclaimed.”

original: sems can zhes pa sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas don du zhes pa sangs rgyas nyid kyi don du'o //
analyzed: sems can zhes pa sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas don du zhes pa sangs rgyas nyid kyi don du'o //
translated: The sentient beings are the sentient beings; for the sake of the Buddha is for the sake of Buddhahood itself.

original: de ltar rdo rje thugs dang dril bu skur dang de'i sgra gsung ngo zhes gsum po byang chub kyi sems kho nar rtogs par bya'o zhes nye bar bsdu ba /
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje thugs dang dril bu skur dang de'i sgra gsung ngo zhes gsum po byang chub kyi sems kho nar rtogs par bya'o zhes nye bar bsdu ba /
translated: Thus, vajra mind, bell body, and its sound speech should be understood as just the thought of enlightenment, is the summary.

original: rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The vajra, etc., are the three.

original: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ni kye rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ni kye rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: The yogins are the yogins of that.

original: de lta bu'i de kho na nyid mi shes pa las dngos grub ma yin no zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: de lta bu'i de kho na nyid mi shes pa las dngos grub ma yin no zhes gsungs pa /
translated: It is said that there is no success for one who does not know suchness.

original: de nyid ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The suchness, etc., are the three.

original: 'dir cha gsum mnyam pa nyid ni rdo rje rnams thams cad kyi thun mong gi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: 'dir cha gsum mnyam pa nyid ni rdo rje rnams thams cad kyi thun mong gi mtshan nyid do //
translated: Here, the equality of the three parts is the common characteristic of all vajras.

original: cha gsum pa'i sum cha'i tshad du lte ba cha shas brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: cha gsum pa'i sum cha'i tshad du lte ba cha shas brgyad pa'o //
translated: The navel of the three parts is one-third of the measure of the three parts, with eight parts.

original: rva rnams ni cha shas zur bzhi brtse mo gug pa'o //
analyzed: rva rnams ni cha shas zur bzhi brtse mo gug pa'o //
translated: The horns are four-sided parts, with a curved tip.

original: rva'i dbus kyi 'og ni zlum pa'o //
analyzed: rva'i dbus kyi 'og ni zlum pa'o //
translated: The middle of the horns is round below.

original: rva dbus ma ni drang ba gru bzhi pa rno ba rked dkris gsum dang ldan pa nas kyi dbyibs can no //
analyzed: rva dbus ma ni drang ba gru bzhi pa rno ba rked dkris gsum dang ldan pa nas kyi dbyibs can no //
translated: The middle horn is straight, square, sharp, and has three girdles, and is shaped like a barley grain.

original: 'di'i rtse mo dang phyogs kyi rva'i rtse mo rnams kyi bar ni nas brtsams te /
analyzed: 'di'i rtse mo dang phyogs kyi rva'i rtse mo rnams kyi bar ni nas brtsams te /
translated: The distance between the tip of this horn and the tips of the horns on the sides is the size of a barley grain.

original: rva thams cad phan tshun mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: rva thams cad phan tshun mnyam pa'o //
translated: All the horns are equal in size.

original: dbus ma ni cung zad lhag pa'o //
analyzed: dbus ma ni cung zad lhag pa'o //
translated: The middle one is slightly larger.

original: rva rnams kyi cung zad 'og phra ba /
analyzed: rva rnams kyi cung zad 'og phra ba /
translated: The horns are slightly thinner below,

original: dbus de las sbom pa /
analyzed: dbus de las sbom pa /
translated: thicker in the middle,

original: steng ni 'og gi cha las phra ba'o //
analyzed: steng ni 'og gi cha las phra ba'o //
translated: and thinner at the top than at the bottom.

original: dbus kyi cha yis yang dbus sbom zhing mtha' gnyis de bas phra ba'o //
analyzed: dbus kyi cha yis yang dbus sbom zhing mtha' gnyis de bas phra ba'o //
translated: The middle part is thicker than the two ends.

original: rva rnams chu srin gyi so'i bar na gnas pa rnams te /
analyzed: rva rnams chu srin gyi so'i bar na gnas pa rnams te /
translated: The horns are located between the tusks of the makara.

original: 'di'i sna ni steng du 'bras so ba'i lkog pa'i phyed kyi tshad do //
analyzed: 'di'i sna ni steng du 'bras so ba'i lkog pa'i phyed kyi tshad do //
translated: The tip of the nose is half the size of the back of the barley grain.

original: chu srin gyi gdong ni rva'i bzhi cha'o //
analyzed: chu srin gyi gdong ni rva'i bzhi cha'o //
translated: The face of the makara is one-fourth of the horn.

original: chu srin gyi gdong gi phyed kyi mu khyud do //
analyzed: chu srin gyi gdong gi phyed kyi mu khyud do //
translated: The circumference of the makara's face is half of that.

original: ske rags 'di'i dbus kyi cha ni cung zad lhag par bya'o //
analyzed: ske rags 'di'i dbus kyi cha ni cung zad lhag par bya'o //
translated: The middle part of this girdle should be slightly larger.

original: cha lhag ma dag phan tshun mnyam zhing rim gyis nyis 'gyur gyis mtho ba'o //
analyzed: cha lhag ma dag phan tshun mnyam zhing rim gyis nyis 'gyur gyis mtho ba'o //
translated: The remaining parts are equal to each other and are twice as high as the previous one.

original: bskor ba yang rdo rje'i phyed kyi tshad de /
analyzed: bskor ba yang rdo rje'i phyed kyi tshad de /
translated: The circumference is the measure of half a vajra.

original: bskor ba'i tshad gnyis ni rdo rje thams cad kyi ring bar ro ;
analyzed: bskor ba'i tshad gnyis ni rdo rje thams cad kyi ring bar ro ;
translated: The two measures of the circumference are the length of all vajras.

original: /'od zer la sogs pa yang lung ji lta bar blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: /'od zer la sogs pa yang lung ji lta bar blta bar bya'o //
translated: The light rays, etc., should be seen just as in the scriptures.

original: sor bzhi nas brtsams nas sor nyi shu'i bar du rdo rje rab tu grags so //
analyzed: sor bzhi nas brtsams nas sor nyi shu'i bar du rdo rje rab tu grags so //
translated: The vajra is well known from four finger breadths up to twenty finger breadths.

original: ji ltar 'dod par ro zhes pa kha cig go //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod par ro zhes pa kha cig go //
translated: Some say it is as one wishes.

original: gang du dbus kyi lte ba la bla na med pa'i chos nyid mtshon par byed pa h'um yig go //
analyzed: gang du dbus kyi lte ba la bla na med pa'i chos nyid mtshon par byed pa h'um yig go //
translated: In the center, the syllable hum, which indicates the unsurpassed reality, is in the center.

original: rva dbus ma la mngon du phyogs @273b pa nyid kyi rva rnams kyi yongs mtha' 'jug pas gzugs la sogs pa rnams thams cad rnam par shes pa'i gtso bo can no zhes gsal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: rva dbus ma la mngon du phyogs @273b pa nyid kyi rva rnams kyi yongs mtha' 'jug pas gzugs la sogs pa rnams thams cad rnam par shes pa'i gtso bo can no zhes gsal bar byed pa'o //
translated: On the central prong, the syllable hum faces outward, and the ends of the prongs enter, clarifying that all forms, etc., are dominated by consciousness.

original: 'di thams cad kyang thams cad kyi bdag nyid do zhes rig pa'i ched du thams cad du gru bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: 'di thams cad kyang thams cad kyi bdag nyid do zhes rig pa'i ched du thams cad du gru bzhi pa'o //
translated: All of this is the nature of everything, and for the sake of knowing that, it is square in all directions.

original: stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa nyid rtogs pa'i don du thams cad du rgyas pa gsum mo //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa nyid rtogs pa'i don du thams cad du rgyas pa gsum mo //
translated: For the sake of realizing emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness, it is triangular in all directions.

original: rtse gcig pa dang rtse gsum pa dang rtse lnga pa dang rtse dgu pa zhes pa rdo rje rnam pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: rtse gcig pa dang rtse gsum pa dang rtse lnga pa dang rtse dgu pa zhes pa rdo rje rnam pa bzhi'o //
translated: The four types of vajras are the one-pointed, the three-pointed, the five-pointed, and the nine-pointed.

original: rno ba dang mi rno ba dang gdengs pa dang zhi ba'i dbye bas rnam pa gnyis so //
analyzed: rno ba dang mi rno ba dang gdengs pa dang zhi ba'i dbye bas rnam pa gnyis so //
translated: They are of two types, according to the distinctions of sharpness, unsharpness, upward-facing, and downward-facing.

original: sna tshogs rdo rje ni rtse mo lnga'i sgo bzhi pa can dang rtse gsum pa'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje ni rtse mo lnga'i sgo bzhi pa can dang rtse gsum pa'o //
translated: The crossed vajra has five points and four doors, and the three-pointed vajra.

original: de la khro bo'i rdo rje kha gdengs pa ste /
analyzed: de la khro bo'i rdo rje kha gdengs pa ste /
translated: There, the wrathful vajra is upward-facing.

original: rdo rje rtse gcig pa ni 'dod chags dman par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rtse gcig pa ni 'dod chags dman par byed pa'o //
translated: The one-pointed vajra is for the sake of subduing desire.

original: rgyan gyi rdo rje ni spyi bor sor lnga pa'i tshad do //
analyzed: rgyan gyi rdo rje ni spyi bor sor lnga pa'i tshad do //
translated: The ornament vajra is five finger-widths in size at the crown.

original: rna ba dag la sor drug pa'i tshad do //
analyzed: rna ba dag la sor drug pa'i tshad do //
translated: It is six finger-widths in size at the ears.

original: mgrin pa la sor bzhi pa'i tshad do //
analyzed: mgrin pa la sor bzhi pa'i tshad do //
translated: It is four finger-widths in size at the throat.

original: snying gar sor lnga pa'i tshad do //🔽gsang bar sor drug pa'i tshad do //
analyzed: snying gar sor lnga pa'i tshad do // gsang bar sor drug pa'i tshad do //
translated: Five finger-breadths at the heart.🔽Six finger-breadths at the secret place.

original: lag pa dag la sor drug pa'i tshad do //
analyzed: lag pa dag la sor drug pa'i tshad do //
translated: Six finger-breadths on the hands.

original: yang na rgyan rdo rje rnams kyi tshad ni ji ltar mdzes par ro //
analyzed: yang na rgyan rdo rje rnams kyi tshad ni ji ltar mdzes par ro //
translated: Or else, the size of the ornaments, the vajras, is according to what is pleasing.

original: dril bu rnams thams cad ni cha gsum mnyam pa rdo rje dang rjes su mthun pa'i tshad do //
analyzed: dril bu rnams thams cad ni cha gsum mnyam pa rdo rje dang rjes su mthun pa'i tshad do //
translated: All the bells are the same size as the third part of the vajra, which is in accordance with the vajra.

original: de rnams kyi 'og gi cha gsum pa ni kha nas bzung ste 'khar ba dag pa'i rang bzhin du bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi 'og gi cha gsum pa ni kha nas bzung ste 'khar ba dag pa'i rang bzhin du bya'o //
translated: The third part below them should be held at the mouth and made of iron.

original: de'i steng gi cha gnyis ni gser la sogs pa las byung ba'o //
analyzed: de'i steng gi cha gnyis ni gser la sogs pa las byung ba'o //
translated: The two parts above that are made of gold and so forth.

original: de'i 'khar ba'i dbus kyi nam mkha' rgya dang mchur mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: de'i 'khar ba'i dbus kyi nam mkha' rgya dang mchur mnyam pa'o //
translated: The space in the middle of the iron is equal to the width and height.

original: mchu las sked du ska rags dag gi dbus su rdo rje la sogs pa'i phreng ba'o //
analyzed: mchu las sked du ska rags dag gi dbus su rdo rje la sogs pa'i phreng ba'o //
translated: In the middle of the girdle at the waist from the mouth, there is a garland of vajras and so forth.

original: bdud rtsi'i bum pa'i 'og tu stegs bu gru bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i bum pa'i 'og tu stegs bu gru bzhi pa'o //
translated: Below the vase of nectar, there is a square platform.

original: de'i 'og tu phreng ba gsum mo //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu phreng ba gsum mo //
translated: Below that, there are three garlands.

original: de'i 'og tu padma'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu padma'o //
translated: Below that, there is a lotus.

original: de'i 'og tu ska rags dag gi dbus su ji ltar rigs par rdo rje la sogs pa'i phreng ba'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu ska rags dag gi dbus su ji ltar rigs par rdo rje la sogs pa'i phreng ba'o //
translated: Below that, in the middle of the belts, is a garland of vajras, etc., as appropriate.

original: de'i 'og tu rin po che sna tshogs pa'i dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu rin po che sna tshogs pa'i dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'o //
translated: Below that, there is a latticework of various jewels and half-latticework.

original: dra ba'i nang brgyad du mtshan ma brgyad rnams te /
analyzed: dra ba'i nang brgyad du mtshan ma brgyad rnams te /
translated: In the eight inner squares of the latticework, there are eight signs.

original: shar la sogs pa rnams su 'khor lo dang rin po che dang padma dang ral gri'o //
analyzed: shar la sogs pa rnams su 'khor lo dang rin po che dang padma dang ral gri'o //
translated: In the east, etc., there are a wheel, a jewel, a lotus, and a sword.

original: spyan dang rdo rje dang padma dang autpala la ni me la sogs pa phyogs mtshams rnams su'o //
analyzed: spyan dang rdo rje dang padma dang autpala la ni me la sogs pa phyogs mtshams rnams su'o //
translated: In the northeast, etc., there are an eye, a vajra, a lotus, and an utpala.

original: ji ltar mdzes par gnas rnams su ku mu da dang autpala dang padma dang rin po che dang pa tra dang mu khyud la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ji ltar mdzes par gnas rnams su ku mu da dang autpala dang padma dang rin po che dang pa tra dang mu khyud la sogs pa ste /
translated: In the southeast, etc., there are a kumuda, an utpala, a lotus, a jewel, a patra, a halo, etc., as is beautiful.

original: lung ji lta bar gzhan yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: lung ji lta bar gzhan yang shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know the others as in the scriptures.

original: bum pa'i tshad du shes rab kyi zhal lo //
analyzed: bum pa'i tshad du shes rab kyi zhal lo //
translated: The height of the vase is the face of wisdom.

original: zhal las steng du @274a * //
analyzed: zhal las steng du @274a * //
translated: Above the face,

original: sngar gyi rdo rje phyed lta bu'i rdo rje phyed pa'o //
analyzed: sngar gyi rdo rje phyed lta bu'i rdo rje phyed pa'o //
translated: there is a half-vajra like the previous half-vajra.

original: 'dir dril bu 'ga' zhig dpal rgyal ma cung zad zlum pa'i chu skyes kyi kha can no //
analyzed: 'dir dril bu 'ga' zhig dpal rgyal ma cung zad zlum pa'i chu skyes kyi kha can no //
translated: Here, some bells have a slightly round lotus mouth of glorious Jayamahālakṣmī.

original: kha cig padma'i'o //
analyzed: kha cig padma'i'o //
translated: Some have lotuses.

original: kha cig pa lang gi kha can no //
analyzed: kha cig pa lang gi kha can no //
translated: Some have cow faces.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i dril bu ni rtse dgu pa /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i dril bu ni rtse dgu pa /
translated: The bell of Vajrasattva has nine points.

original: sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshad can shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su mtsho skyes dkar po dang chu skyes sngon po dang chu skyes dmar po dang autpala rnams so //
analyzed: sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshad can shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su mtsho skyes dkar po dang chu skyes sngon po dang chu skyes dmar po dang autpala rnams so //
translated: The size is twelve fingerbreadths. In the east and so forth are white utpala, blue utpala, red utpala, and blue lotus.

original: kha cig tu dril bu sor mo dgu pa dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i mtshan ma spangs pa kha sor lnga pa'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: kha cig tu dril bu sor mo dgu pa dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i mtshan ma spangs pa kha sor lnga pa'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: In some places, it is said that the bell is nine fingerbreadths, without the signs of a net and half-net, and five fingerbreadths wide.

original: rtse lnga pa'am rtse dgu pa ni dpa' bo'i dril bur brjod do //
analyzed: rtse lnga pa'am rtse dgu pa ni dpa' bo'i dril bur brjod do //
translated: The five- or nine-pointed one is called the hero's bell.

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i yang /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i yang /
translated: Also, for Vairocana and so forth,

original: 'khor lo'i phreng ba gnyis dang ldan pa ni ske rags gnyis kyi dbus su ste /
analyzed: 'khor lo'i phreng ba gnyis dang ldan pa ni ske rags gnyis kyi dbus su ste /
translated: having two rows of wheels is in the middle of the two belts.

original: de bzhin du padma dang rin po che dang ral gri'i phreng ba gnyis dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du padma dang rin po che dang ral gri'i phreng ba gnyis dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Likewise, he has two garlands of lotus, jewels, and swords.

original: rdo rje'i rigs kyi ni ba lang gi kha can rdo rje'i phreng ba'i ske rags gnyis dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i rigs kyi ni ba lang gi kha can rdo rje'i phreng ba'i ske rags gnyis dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The Vajra family has two girdles of bull-hide and a vajra garland.

original: gang 'dir steng dang 'og gi cha dag tu rdo rje phreng ba zung gis mdzes pa de ni chos 'byung ni mi phyed pa'i ye shes kyi gnas nyid du rtogs pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: gang 'dir steng dang 'og gi cha dag tu rdo rje phreng ba zung gis mdzes pa de ni chos 'byung ni mi phyed pa'i ye shes kyi gnas nyid du rtogs pa'i don du'o //
translated: The vajra garland pairs in the upper and lower parts beautify it, for the purpose of realizing the source of phenomena as the abode of indivisible gnosis.

original: 'khor lo la sogs pa zung dang ldan pa rnams ni ji ltar rigs par bla na med pa'i zhi ba la sogs pa'i gnas nyid du'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo la sogs pa zung dang ldan pa rnams ni ji ltar rigs par bla na med pa'i zhi ba la sogs pa'i gnas nyid du'o //
translated: Those with pairs of wheels and so forth have the nature of the abode of unsurpassed pacification and so forth, as appropriate.

original: khams gsum pa'i rang bzhin gzhal yas khang nyid du 'di bshad pa'i ched du dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i rnam pa'o zhes pa'o //🔽dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel pa /
analyzed: khams gsum pa'i rang bzhin gzhal yas khang nyid du 'di bshad pa'i ched du dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i rnam pa'o zhes pa'o // dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel pa /
translated: The lattice and half-lattice forms are for the purpose of explaining this very celestial mansion, which has the nature of the three realms.

original: man ngag gi snye mar snye ma nyi shu dgu pa'o /
analyzed: man ngag gi snye mar snye ma nyi shu dgu pa'o /
translated: The twenty-ninth flower in the Garland of Pith Instructions, a commentary on the glorious Heruka's Tantra.

original: // / bgrang phreng gi de kho na nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / bgrang phreng gi de kho na nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: In order to teach the reality of the rosary in detail, he says:

original: nyon zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nyon zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Listen to the rosary, etc.

original: bgrang ba ste ye shes su lhag par mos pa'i lha'i gzugs kyi skud pa ni bgrang phreng ngo //
analyzed: bgrang ba ste ye shes su lhag par mos pa'i lha'i gzugs kyi skud pa ni bgrang phreng ngo //
translated: The rosary is the thread of the form body of the deity, which is imagined as the supreme wisdom.

original: yang mi 'gyur bsngags rnams phreng bar byed grangs su byed pa'i phyir bgrang phreng ste /
analyzed: yang mi 'gyur bsngags rnams phreng bar byed grangs su byed pa'i phyir bgrang phreng ste /
translated: Moreover, the rosary is so called because it is made into a garland and counted, the syllable ra being elided.

original: ra yig phyis pa ni nges tshig go //
analyzed: ra yig phyis pa ni nges tshig go //
translated: The definition is that.

original: sogs pas de la rab gnas la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / gang gis sngags rnams 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: sogs pas de la rab gnas la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / gang gis sngags rnams 'grub pa'o //
translated: The word etc. refers to the characteristics of consecration, etc. and the means by which the mantras are accomplished.

original: mu kti zhes pa mu tig go //
analyzed: mu kti zhes pa mu tig go //
translated: The word mukti means pearl.

original: khams dkar po rnams ni rus pa rnams so //
analyzed: khams dkar po rnams ni rus pa rnams so //
translated: The white elements are the bones.

original: sogs pas rdo ba'i khyad par dkar po rnams so //
analyzed: sogs pas rdo ba'i khyad par dkar po rnams so //
translated: The word etc. refers to the white varieties of stone.

original: nor bu dkar po nor bu rnams so //
analyzed: nor bu dkar po nor bu rnams so //
translated: The white gems are the gems.

original: sogs pas dri ma med pa'i rdzas kyang dri bzang bar byas pa'o //
analyzed: sogs pas dri ma med pa'i rdzas kyang dri bzang bar byas pa'o //
translated: The word etc. refers to the fragrant substances, which are made fragrant.

original: nag po'i sa bon ni lung thang gi sa bon no //
analyzed: nag po'i sa bon ni lung thang gi sa bon no //
translated: The black seeds are the seeds of the flax plant.

original: @274b khyad par gyi las dang rjes su mthun pas las thams cad pa'i sngags 'grub pa'i don du /
analyzed: @274b khyad par gyi las dang rjes su mthun pas las thams cad pa'i sngags 'grub pa'i don du /
translated: In particular, for the sake of accomplishing the mantra of all activities, in accordance with the special activity,

original: ril bu lnga bcu rnams kyis bgrang phreng ngo //
analyzed: ril bu lnga bcu rnams kyis bgrang phreng ngo //
translated: the rosary is of fifty beads.

original: phyogs dang phyogs bral gyi skud pa brgyad rnams la phyag na padma la sogs pa brgyad rnams blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyogs dang phyogs bral gyi skud pa brgyad rnams la phyag na padma la sogs pa brgyad rnams blta bar bya'o //
translated: On the eight threads in the cardinal and intermediate directions, one should visualize the eight, beginning with Padma Holder.

original: skud pa dbus ma la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: skud pa dbus ma la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: On the central thread, all the buddhas are of the nature of Vajrasattva.

original: skud pa yang ras bal las byung ba gzhon nu mas bkal ba gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: skud pa yang ras bal las byung ba gzhon nu mas bkal ba gzung bar bya'o //
translated: The thread should be made of cotton, spun by a young maiden.

original: dgra 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams bcom mo zhes pa'am /
analyzed: dgra 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams bcom mo zhes pa'am /
translated: The enemies are passion and so forth, which are conquered,

original: mchod pa la sogs 'os so zhes pas /
analyzed: mchod pa la sogs 'os so zhes pas /
translated: or they are worthy of worship and so forth.

original: dgra bcom pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams te ril bu'i rang bzhin rnams so ;
analyzed: dgra bcom pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams te ril bu'i rang bzhin rnams so ;
translated: The conquerors are the perfect buddhas, who are of the nature of the beads.

original: / skud pa'i sna gnyis mdud pa'i steng du ril bu bsgreng ba ni stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i chos kyi ngo bo mchod rten zhes bsam mo //
analyzed: / skud pa'i sna gnyis mdud pa'i steng du ril bu bsgreng ba ni stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i chos kyi ngo bo mchod rten zhes bsam mo //
translated: The two ends of the thread, knotted above, with the pill standing upright, is the nature of the Dharma of power, fearlessness, and so forth, imagined as a stupa.

original: de'i steng du ril bu gzhan ni chos kyi dbyings /
analyzed: de'i steng du ril bu gzhan ni chos kyi dbyings /
translated: Above that, the other pill is the sphere of reality,

original: de bzhin nyid chos thams cad mngon du byed pa'i ngo bo can te /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid chos thams cad mngon du byed pa'i ngo bo can te /
translated: suchness, the nature of the realization of all phenomena.

original: chos nyid rtogs pa kho na las rnam par dag pa'i chos rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: chos nyid rtogs pa kho na las rnam par dag pa'i chos rtogs pa'o //
translated: The realization of the pure Dharma is only from the realization of reality.

original: ci byas nas rtogs pa 'di yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci byas nas rtogs pa 'di yin zhe na /
translated: What is the realization that is done?

original: lag mthil zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lag mthil zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The palm of the hand and so forth.

original: dbyangs rnams kyi snga ma aa yig gang gi dang po yin pa de la a'a: zhes pa yi ge ste /
analyzed: dbyangs rnams kyi snga ma aa yig gang gi dang po yin pa de la a'a: zhes pa yi ge ste /
translated: The first of the vowels, which is the letter a, is called aḥ.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las lag pa g-yas par yud kyis bsgom pa'i sor mo rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i ngo bo can la nyi ma des byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las lag pa g-yas par yud kyis bsgom pa'i sor mo rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i ngo bo can la nyi ma des byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: That completely transforms into the right hand, imagined in an instant as the nature of a five-pointed vajra, consecrated by that sun.

original: lag pa g-yon pa na yud kyis sor mo'i 'dab ma can padma'i rnam par bsams la /
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pa na yud kyis sor mo'i 'dab ma can padma'i rnam par bsams la /
translated: In the left hand, imagine the petals of the fingers in the form of a lotus,

original: bdud rtsi'i yi ge aa yig ste /
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i yi ge aa yig ste /
translated: The syllable of nectar is the syllable A.

original: de yongs su gyur pa zla ba kha dog dkar po des byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa zla ba kha dog dkar po des byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: The consecration is the moon, white in color, which is the transformation of that.

original: de dag gi dbus su bgrang phreng bzung nas bshad pa'i lha'i rang bzhin du bsgom zhing /
analyzed: de dag gi dbus su bgrang phreng bzung nas bshad pa'i lha'i rang bzhin du bsgom zhing /
translated: Having taken hold of the rosary in the middle of those, one should meditate on the nature of the deity as explained.

original: aa kkha ru zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs po zhes pa 'di'i rab gnas so //
analyzed: aa kkha ru zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs po zhes pa 'di'i rab gnas so //
translated: The consecration is with the mantra “A ka kha ga” and so forth.

original: lag pa g-yon pa rdo rje ma yin pa rdo rje ru gyur pa ste /
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pa rdo rje ma yin pa rdo rje ru gyur pa ste /
translated: The left hand, which is not the Vajrī, becomes the vajra.

original: ci ltar zhe na rdo rje lag pa g-yas pa dang gnyis su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na rdo rje lag pa g-yas pa dang gnyis su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: How so? Because the vajra and the right hand are nondual.

original: rdo rje dang padma dag stong pa nyid dang snying rje dag dbyer med par bsgom pas lag pa g-yas pas sngags bzla'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rdo rje dang padma dag stong pa nyid dang snying rje dag dbyer med par bsgom pas lag pa g-yas pas sngags bzla'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should recite the mantra with the right hand, meditating on the vajra and the lotus, emptiness and compassion, as inseparable.

original: sor mo'i khyad par gsungs pa /
analyzed: sor mo'i khyad par gsungs pa /
translated: The special fingers are stated:

original: zhi ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhi ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “The pacifying” and so forth.

original: khro bo zhes pa sdigs mdzub la'o /
analyzed: khro bo zhes pa sdigs mdzub la'o /
translated: The wrathful is the threatening gesture.

original: yongs kyi mtha' zhes pa mthe'u chung la'o //
analyzed: yongs kyi mtha' zhes pa mthe'u chung la'o //
translated: The end of all is the little finger.

original: lha rnams dgug pa'i bsams pas rdo rje lcags @275a * //
analyzed: lha rnams dgug pa'i bsams pas rdo rje lcags @275a * //
translated: With the thought of summoning the deities, one should recite with the thumb of the vajra hook

original: kyu'i ngo bor bsgom pa'i mthe bong gis bgrang phreng rab tu 'bebs shing bzla'o //🔽de lta bu yang mnyam par gzhag pa ji skad bshad pa'i ngo bo la ting nge 'dzin par gal te gyur pa de'i tshe 'grub kyi gzhan du ma yin no zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: kyu'i ngo bor bsgom pa'i mthe bong gis bgrang phreng rab tu 'bebs shing bzla'o // de lta bu yang mnyam par gzhag pa ji skad bshad pa'i ngo bo la ting nge 'dzin par gal te gyur pa de'i tshe 'grub kyi gzhan du ma yin no zhes gsungs pa /
translated: contemplating the nature of the vajra hook, pressing down the rosary.

original: de nyid med pas shes pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid med pas shes pa ste /
translated: If one becomes absorbed in the samādhi of the nature of the equipoise as explained, then at that time there is accomplishment, not otherwise. Thus it is said: Without that, there is no knowledge.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i de kho na nyid mi bsgom pas so //🔽phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid stong pa nyid du /
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i de kho na nyid mi bsgom pas so // phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid stong pa nyid du /
translated: Without cultivating the reality as explained,🔽the reality of the seal is not accomplished without the conviction of emptiness.

original: lhag par mos pa med par mi 'grub pa zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: lhag par mos pa med par mi 'grub pa zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: The remainder is understood.

original: de'i phyir rnal 'byor pa de kho na nyid sgom pa kho nas de kho na nyid gang gi gang ngo bo yin pa des thams cad byed do //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnal 'byor pa de kho na nyid sgom pa kho nas de kho na nyid gang gi gang ngo bo yin pa des thams cad byed do //
translated: Therefore, the yogin, by cultivating reality alone, does everything with that very nature of reality.

original: de nyid kyi phyir aa kkha ru zhes pa la sogs pa sv'a h'a'i mthar thug pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir aa kkha ru zhes pa la sogs pa sv'a h'a'i mthar thug pa'i sngags so //
translated: For that very reason, the mantra from a ka kha up to sva ha is the mantra.

original: yi ge aa yig la sogs pa rnams gang gi rgyu yin pa de rnams de skad do //
analyzed: yi ge aa yig la sogs pa rnams gang gi rgyu yin pa de rnams de skad do //
translated: Those that are the cause of the letters A and so on are called that.

original: de gang gi ngo bo yin pa de de kho na nyid kyis sbyang ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: de gang gi ngo bo yin pa de de kho na nyid kyis sbyang ba'i sngags so //
translated: That which is the nature of that is the mantra to be purified by reality.

original: dngos grub kyi rgyu nyid kyi phyir snying po'o //
analyzed: dngos grub kyi rgyu nyid kyi phyir snying po'o //
translated: It is the essence because it is the cause of power.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rgyas par ston pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rgyas par ston pa /
translated: For that very reason, it is taught extensively.

original: bgrangs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bgrangs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The enumeration and so on.

original: bgrangs pa las te grangs las kyang grangs med pa ste /
analyzed: bgrangs pa las te grangs las kyang grangs med pa ste /
translated: From enumeration, from number, there is the non-number,

original: don dam par ro //
analyzed: don dam par ro //
translated: in ultimate reality.

original: gang gi phyir brdzun pa sgyu ma lta bu ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir brdzun pa sgyu ma lta bu ste /
translated: Because it is false, like an illusion.

original: brdzun par rtogs pa kho nas 'grub bo /
analyzed: brdzun par rtogs pa kho nas 'grub bo /
translated: It is accomplished just by realizing the falsity.

original: de'i phyir de kho na nyid kho na snying po ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir de kho na nyid kho na snying po ste /
translated: Therefore, reality alone is the essence,

original: mngon par 'dod pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: because it accomplishes what is desired. This is the meaning.

original: nye bar sdud de /
analyzed: nye bar sdud de /
translated: It is summarized.

original: bgrang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bgrang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The enumeration and so on.

original: de ltar bgrang phreng dag par byed pa'i sngags rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs la /
analyzed: de ltar bgrang phreng dag par byed pa'i sngags rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs la /
translated: Thus, having blessed the rosary with the mantras that purify it,

original: gang gi tshe kha cig tu bsgrub par bya ba la thob par 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe de sgrub par byed de /
analyzed: gang gi tshe kha cig tu bsgrub par bya ba la thob par 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe de sgrub par byed de /
translated: When one wishes to attain something, then one accomplishes it.

original: de dang rjes su mthun pa'i sngags zlos shing byin gyis brlabs pa'i bgrang phreng gis so //
analyzed: de dang rjes su mthun pa'i sngags zlos shing byin gyis brlabs pa'i bgrang phreng gis so //
translated: Reciting the mantra that is in accord with that, with the rosary that is empowered.

original: de nyid ces pa de kho na nyid so ;
analyzed: de nyid ces pa de kho na nyid so ;
translated: That itself is reality.

original: / yongs su mi gsal ba ni mi gsal ba ste /
analyzed: / yongs su mi gsal ba ni mi gsal ba ste /
translated: Unclear is indistinct.

original: gal te nges pas lhag par mos pa med na de'i tshe dngos grub ring ba ste /
analyzed: gal te nges pas lhag par mos pa med na de'i tshe dngos grub ring ba ste /
translated: If one does not have firm conviction, then siddhi is far away.

original: med pa kho na'am /
analyzed: med pa kho na'am /
translated: It is nonexistent, or

original: dus yun ring pos res 'ga' cung zad tsam 'grub bo zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: dus yun ring pos res 'ga' cung zad tsam 'grub bo zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
translated: it is accomplished after a long time, or it is accomplished a little bit sometimes.

original: ye shes kyi mtshan nyid rgyas par ston pa /
analyzed: ye shes kyi mtshan nyid rgyas par ston pa /
translated: The extensive teaching of the characteristics of wisdom:

original: nyon zhes pa la sogs pa ste ;
analyzed: nyon zhes pa la sogs pa ste ;
translated: Listen, etc.

original: ye shes chen po ni rdo rje snying po'o //
analyzed: ye shes chen po ni rdo rje snying po'o //
translated: Great wisdom is the vajra essence.

original: mnyam par gzhag pa na ste /
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pa na ste /
translated: In equipoise,

original: ting nge 'dzin par gyur pa na'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin par gyur pa na'o //
translated: in the state of samadhi.

original: 'khor lo ni lha'i tshogs pa dang khams gsum pa'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo ni lha'i tshogs pa dang khams gsum pa'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: The wheel is the assembly of deities and the wheel of the three realms.

original: shes rab dang snying rje dag ro gcig pa nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi khyad par las so //
analyzed: shes rab dang snying rje dag ro gcig pa nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi khyad par las so //
translated: From the special thought of awakening, the unity of wisdom and compassion.

original: zla ba la ste sna tshogs @275b padma'i steng du'o /
analyzed: zla ba la ste sna tshogs @275b padma'i steng du'o /
translated: On the moon, on top of a variegated lotus.

original: ye shes kho na sa bon te /
analyzed: ye shes kho na sa bon te /
translated: The seed is just wisdom.

original: shes rab rnon pos rdzus skyes nyid kyis ye shes rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes rab rnon pos rdzus skyes nyid kyis ye shes rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of spontaneous birth, wisdom is perfected by one of sharp wisdom.

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:

original: rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa //
translated: Endowed with the supreme of all aspects,

original: spro dang sdud pa'i byed pa po //
analyzed: spro dang sdud pa'i byed pa po //
translated: The agent of emanation and withdrawal,

original: yud kyis ye shes rdzogs pa ni //
analyzed: yud kyis ye shes rdzogs pa ni //
translated: The perfection of wisdom in an instant,

original: rnal 'byor rdzogs par brjod par bya //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rdzogs par brjod par bya //
translated: The perfection of yoga is to be stated.

original: zhes so // shes rab rtul po ni ye shes kyi sa bon h'um ngo //
analyzed: zhes so // shes rab rtul po ni ye shes kyi sa bon h'um ngo //
translated: One of dull wisdom has the seed of wisdom, the syllable hūṃ.

original: rgyan ni 'khor lo can la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rgyan ni 'khor lo can la sogs pa'o //
translated: The ornaments are the wheel-holder, etc.

original: rdo rje dang rdo rje'i dril bu dang ldan pa'i phyag dag gis phyag rgya chen mo rang dang 'dra ba kha dog dkar mo shin tu mdzes ma la 'khyud pa snying gar 'tshir ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dang rdo rje'i dril bu dang ldan pa'i phyag dag gis phyag rgya chen mo rang dang 'dra ba kha dog dkar mo shin tu mdzes ma la 'khyud pa snying gar 'tshir ba'o //
translated: With hands holding a vajra and a vajra bell, he embraces the great seal, who is similar to himself, the white, very beautiful lady, and presses her to his heart.

original: a'a r'a ta ste ring du sgrib pa gnyis las song ba ni 'phags pa'o //
analyzed: a'a r'a ta ste ring du sgrib pa gnyis las song ba ni 'phags pa'o //
translated: The ārya is one who has gone far from the two obscurations.

original: de nyid kyi phyir mngon par shes pa la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyis snang bar mdzad pas na rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mngon par shes pa la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyis snang bar mdzad pas na rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: Therefore, he is Vairocana because he illuminates with various kinds of supernormal knowledge, etc.

original: rnam par snang mdzad de kho na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad de kho na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: That Vairocana is the Vajra Holder.

original: gtso bo ni spro ba dang sdud pa la sogs pa rnams la mthu can gyi ngang tshul nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gtso bo ni spro ba dang sdud pa la sogs pa rnams la mthu can gyi ngang tshul nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The chief is so called because of his power in the emanation and withdrawal of the world.

original: cig car zlos pa ni dam tshig gi bzlas pa'o ;
analyzed: cig car zlos pa ni dam tshig gi bzlas pa'o ;
translated: Simultaneous repetition is pledge repetition.

original: / rim gyis zlos pa ni khyogs la sogs pa'i bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: / rim gyis zlos pa ni khyogs la sogs pa'i bzlas pa'o //
translated: Gradual repetition is palanquin repetition, etc.

original: de gnyis ka khyad par du byed de /
analyzed: de gnyis ka khyad par du byed de /
translated: He distinguishes both of those.

original: g-yon zhes pa la sogs pas so //
analyzed: g-yon zhes pa la sogs pas so //
translated: With left, etc.

original: lag pa gnyis gang yang rung bas bgrang phreng bskor ba'i phyir bzlas pa yang bskor ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: lag pa gnyis gang yang rung bas bgrang phreng bskor ba'i phyir bzlas pa yang bskor ba lta bu'o //
translated: Repetition by turning the rosary with either hand is repetition like a wheel.

original: lha rnams de las te sngags bzlas pa las bde bar dgyes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lha rnams de las te sngags bzlas pa las bde bar dgyes par 'gyur ro //
translated: The gods are pleased by that, i.e., by the mantra repetition.

original: ci'i sngags kyi bzlas pa zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i sngags kyi bzlas pa zhe na /
translated: What is the mantra recitation of the seed?

original: a'a li dag gi aom a'a: yig dag go //🔽k'a li ni sv'a h'a'o //
analyzed: a'a li dag gi aom a'a: yig dag go // k'a li ni sv'a h'a'o //
translated: The seed of the vowels is the letters O and A.🔽The seed of the consonants is the letter SVAH.

original: sa bon ni h'um ste de rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: sa bon ni h'um ste de rnams kyi'o //
translated: The seed of the hum is the letter HUM.

original: ci ltar zhe na h'um yig skud pa ste /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na h'um yig skud pa ste /
translated: How is that? The letter HUM is the thread,

original: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it illuminates the reality of body, speech, and mind.

original: des brgyus shing snying por byas par ji ltar 'gyur ba ltar ro //
analyzed: des brgyus shing snying por byas par ji ltar 'gyur ba ltar ro //
translated: It is the thread and the essence, just as it is.

original: aom a'a: h'um sv'a h'a zhes pa'o //
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um sv'a h'a zhes pa'o //
translated: The mantra is OM AH HUM SVAH.

original: sa bon 'di kho na bskyed pa'i don du snying gar yang bsgom mo zhes pa drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: sa bon 'di kho na bskyed pa'i don du snying gar yang bsgom mo zhes pa drang ba'i don to //
translated: This very seed is also meditated upon in the heart for the sake of generation. This is the interpretable meaning explanation.

original: cig car 'ga' zhig gi tshe stong pa nyid dang snying rje zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa khyad par du bskyed pas sngags gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi bzlas pa goms pa'o ;
analyzed: cig car 'ga' zhig gi tshe stong pa nyid dang snying rje zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa khyad par du bskyed pas sngags gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi bzlas pa goms pa'o ;
translated: The recitation of the nondual intuition of the mantra is the practice of the stage of the union of emptiness and compassion, which is generated at some times all at once.

original: / khyad par ci zhe na /
analyzed: / khyad par ci zhe na /
translated: What is the difference?

original: brjod par bya ste /🔽g-yon pa shes rab bo //
analyzed: brjod par bya ste / g-yon pa shes rab bo //
translated: It should be stated.🔽The left is wisdom.

original: g-yas pa thabs so //
analyzed: g-yas pa thabs so //
translated: The right is means.

original: de dag gi lag bdag gi bde ba 'dzin pa'i thabs rdo rje dang padma dag go //
analyzed: de dag gi lag bdag gi bde ba 'dzin pa'i thabs rdo rje dang padma dag go //
translated: The means of grasping the bliss of those is the vajra and lotus.

original: de gnyis las mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi ste /
analyzed: de gnyis las mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi ste /
translated: From those two, the dakinis,

original: aa wa dh'u t'i la sogs pa rnams kyi de'i bde ba khyad par te gang rnams kyis @276a * //
analyzed: aa wa dh'u t'i la sogs pa rnams kyi de'i bde ba khyad par te gang rnams kyis @276a * //
translated: the bliss of those, which is special, is the avadhuti, etc.

original: bgrod par bya'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: bgrod par bya'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: By which one should go, is the thought.

original: bskor ba ni srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag la mi gnas pa'o //
analyzed: bskor ba ni srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag la mi gnas pa'o //
translated: The circling is not remaining in samsara and nirvana.

original: a'a li ni khu ba'o //
analyzed: a'a li ni khu ba'o //
translated: Ali is semen.

original: k'a li ni rdul lo //
analyzed: k'a li ni rdul lo //
translated: Kali is the ovum.

original: sa bon ni gnyis ka'i nang du son pa'i sems te /
analyzed: sa bon ni gnyis ka'i nang du son pa'i sems te /
translated: The seed is the mind that is within both,

original: mngal 'dzin pa'i gnas skabs su bar do'i srid pa nas 'ongs nas skye ba'i myu gu skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngal 'dzin pa'i gnas skabs su bar do'i srid pa nas 'ongs nas skye ba'i myu gu skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the sprout of birth is produced from the intermediate state of existence that has entered the state of holding the womb.

original: de rnams dang 'brel ba can h'um yig ste /
analyzed: de rnams dang 'brel ba can h'um yig ste /
translated: That is connected with the syllable hum.

original: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi dga' ba gsum po dga' ba dang mchog dga' dang khyad dga'i ngo bo'o //🔽de kho na skud pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi dga' ba gsum po dga' ba dang mchog dga' dang khyad dga'i ngo bo'o // de kho na skud pa lta bu ste /
translated: The three joys of body, speech, and mind are the nature of joy, supreme joy, and special joy.🔽That is the thread.

original: des brgyus pas na sbrel ba ste /
analyzed: des brgyus pas na sbrel ba ste /
translated: Because it is strung with that, it is connected.

original: dga' ba gsum po ro gcig pa'i lhan cig skyes pa ni khyad par ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: dga' ba gsum po ro gcig pa'i lhan cig skyes pa ni khyad par ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The connate [joy] that is of one taste with the three joys is the special.

original: 'di'i zhes pa 'di kho na ste sa bon gyis rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i rang bzhin goms par bya'o zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'di'i zhes pa 'di kho na ste sa bon gyis rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i rang bzhin goms par bya'o zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
translated: This is the definitive meaning: “Here” means in this very [life], one should cultivate the nature of the seed, which is the emptiness and compassion.

original: de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' sems can gyi don gyi dbang las dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po la sogs pa gzugs dang dbyibs dang phyag la sogs pa ma nges par khams gsum pa
analyzed: de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' sems can gyi don gyi dbang las dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po la sogs pa gzugs dang dbyibs dang phyag la sogs pa ma nges par khams gsum pa
translated: Thus, the Bhagavān Vajrasattva, through the power of benefiting sentient beings, is not definite in terms of color, shape, hands, and so on, such as white, yellow, red, and so on.

original: mu mtha' med pa rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i bkod pa sna tshogs rnams kyis spro ba dang sdud cing stong pa nyid dang snying rje ro gcig pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin ni ye shes kyi de kho na nyid do zhes gsungs so
analyzed: mu mtha' med pa rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i bkod pa sna tshogs rnams kyis spro ba dang sdud cing stong pa nyid dang snying rje ro gcig pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin ni ye shes kyi de kho na nyid do zhes gsungs so
translated: In the infinite worlds of the three realms, he emanates and gathers in various arrays, such as the tathāgatas, and is the nature of great bliss, which is the single taste of emptiness and compassion. This is the suchness of gnosis.

original: zhes pa'o // dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel ba /
analyzed: zhes pa'o // dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel ba /
translated: Thus.

original: man ngag gi snye mar snye ma sum cu pa'o /
analyzed: man ngag gi snye mar snye ma sum cu pa'o /
translated: This is the thirtieth flower in the garland of the guru's instructions, the commentary on the glorious Heruka's Tantra.

original: // / skye ba'i bye brag kyang thabs kyi yan lag yin pas /
analyzed: // / skye ba'i bye brag kyang thabs kyi yan lag yin pas /
translated: The particular birth is also a branch of the method.

original: 'chi ba'i rtags yongs su shes pa las /
analyzed: 'chi ba'i rtags yongs su shes pa las /
translated: From the thorough knowledge of the signs of death,🔽if one is unable to correct it, then at the time of the transference of consciousness, one is born in a special place.

original: gal te phyir bcos par mi nus na de'i tshe 'pho bas rnam par shes pa btang ba las khyad par can gyi gnas su skye'o zhes pas 'pho ba bshad pa'i ched du rtsom pa nyon zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gal te phyir bcos par mi nus na de'i tshe 'pho bas rnam par shes pa btang ba las khyad par can gyi gnas su skye'o zhes pas 'pho ba bshad pa'i ched du rtsom pa nyon zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Thus, in order to explain the transference of consciousness, [the Bhagavān] begins, “Listen to the yoga of the upward movement.

original: gyen du bgrod pa ni 'pho ba ste /
analyzed: gyen du bgrod pa ni 'pho ba ste /
translated: ” The upward movement is the transference of consciousness.

original: de'i don du ba'i rnal 'byor ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par te de'i rang gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: de'i don du ba'i rnal 'byor ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par te de'i rang gi ngo bo'o //
translated: For that purpose, the yoga is a special meditative stabilization, which is its own nature.

original: 'gro ba mdzes pa zhes gsungs na yang yon tan gyi khyad par bstan pa'i ched du zhus pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba mdzes pa zhes gsungs na yang yon tan gyi khyad par bstan pa'i ched du zhus pa'o //
translated: Although it is said to be the beautiful movement, it is asked in order to teach the special qualities.

original: rab tu sbyor ba ni rjes su bsgrub pa ste 'chi ba'i dus su'o //
analyzed: rab tu sbyor ba ni rjes su bsgrub pa ste 'chi ba'i dus su'o //
translated: The application is the subsequent practice at the time of death.

original: tshad ma ni de kho na'i 'o //
analyzed: tshad ma ni de kho na'i 'o //
translated: The measure is the reality.

original: srid par skyon ni ngan 'gro gsum du sdug bsngal bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: srid par skyon ni ngan 'gro gsum du sdug bsngal bar gnas pa'o //
translated: The fault in existence is the suffering of the three miserable realms.

original: rgyas par ston pa'i ched @276b du gsungs pa /
analyzed: rgyas par ston pa'i ched @276b du gsungs pa /
translated: The statement for the purpose of extensive teaching:

original: thig le zhes pa smin ma'i dbus kyi bu ga ste /
analyzed: thig le zhes pa smin ma'i dbus kyi bu ga ste /
translated: The “drop” is the hole in the middle of the eyebrows.

original: de nas 'phos pa'i rnam par shes pa ni gzugs kyi khams su skye'o //
analyzed: de nas 'phos pa'i rnam par shes pa ni gzugs kyi khams su skye'o //
translated: Consciousness that moves from there is born in the form realm.

original: lte ba'i khung bu nas 'dod pa'i khams su'o //
analyzed: lte ba'i khung bu nas 'dod pa'i khams su'o //
translated: From the navel hole, it is born in the desire realm.

original: steng ni gser gyi sgo ste /
analyzed: steng ni gser gyi sgo ste /
translated: The “upper” is the golden door.

original: de nas steng rnams su ste /
analyzed: de nas steng rnams su ste /
translated: From there, it is born in the upper realms.

original: byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su'o //
translated: In the abodes of bodhisattvas and so on.

original: 'gro ba ni 'gro ba gzhan khyad par can du'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba ni 'gro ba gzhan khyad par can du'o //
translated: “Moving” is moving to another, special realm.

original: mig nas mi'i 'gro bar ro //
analyzed: mig nas mi'i 'gro bar ro //
translated: From the eyes, it is born in the human realm.

original: sna nas ni gnod sbyin gyi skye gnas so //
analyzed: sna nas ni gnod sbyin gyi skye gnas so //
translated: From the nose, it is born in the abode of yakṣas.

original: sogs pas kha srid pa'i sgor shes par bya ste /
analyzed: sogs pas kha srid pa'i sgor shes par bya ste /
translated: The “and so on” should be understood as the door of existence.

original: de nas yi dags kyi 'gro bar ro //
analyzed: de nas yi dags kyi 'gro bar ro //
translated: From there, it is born in the realm of hungry ghosts.

original: rna ba nas grub pa'i lha'i skye gnas su'o //
analyzed: rna ba nas grub pa'i lha'i skye gnas su'o //
translated: From the ears, it is born in the abode of accomplished gods.

original: btung ba ni gci ba'i lam ste /
analyzed: btung ba ni gci ba'i lam ste /
translated: The “drink” is the path of urine.

original: des dud 'gror ro //
analyzed: des dud 'gror ro //
translated: By that, it is born as an animal.

original: btung min ni bshad lam ste /
analyzed: btung min ni bshad lam ste /
translated: The “not drink” is the path of feces.

original: des dmyal ba rnams su'o //
analyzed: des dmyal ba rnams su'o //
translated: That is, in the hells.

original: brgyad ces pa dmyal ba gzhan rnams nye bar mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: brgyad ces pa dmyal ba gzhan rnams nye bar mtshon pa'o //
translated: The “eight” are a synecdoche for the other hells.

original: sgo'i khyad par gyis 'pho ba'i rnal 'byor mchog go zhes 'brel lo //
analyzed: sgo'i khyad par gyis 'pho ba'i rnal 'byor mchog go zhes 'brel lo //
translated: The supreme yoga of transference is connected with the special door.

original: shin tu mnyam gzhag ni legs par mnyam par gzhag cing las gzhan med pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: shin tu mnyam gzhag ni legs par mnyam par gzhag cing las gzhan med pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: “Well equipoised” means those who are well equipoised and have no other activity.

original: 'chi ba'i dus thob pa rnams kyi ste /
analyzed: 'chi ba'i dus thob pa rnams kyi ste /
translated: “At the time of death” means those who have attained the time of death.

original: 'chi ba gang yang mtshan mas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'chi ba gang yang mtshan mas shes par bya'o //
translated: Death is also to be known by the signs.

original: de yang rgyud gzhan rnams su bstan to //
analyzed: de yang rgyud gzhan rnams su bstan to //
translated: And that is taught in other tantras.

original: 'chi ba'i dus lam bab pa kho nar rgas pas dang nad rnams kyis gdungs pas ni rnam shes dbye mi bya ste 'pho bar mi bya'o ;
analyzed: 'chi ba'i dus lam bab pa kho nar rgas pas dang nad rnams kyis gdungs pas ni rnam shes dbye mi bya ste 'pho bar mi bya'o ;
translated: “At the time of death, those who are afflicted by old age and sickness should not separate the consciousness, that is, should not perform transference.🔽”

original: / gsung bar 'gyur ba yang /
analyzed: / gsung bar 'gyur ba yang /
translated: It is also said:🔽“Killing the gods at the wrong time.

original: dus min lha rnams gsod pa'o //
analyzed: dus min lha rnams gsod pa'o //
translated: And untimely killing of gods.🔽

original: zhes so // de la 'pho ba byed par 'dod pas thog mar dgang ba bum pa can goms par bya ste /
analyzed: zhes so // de la 'pho ba byed par 'dod pas thog mar dgang ba bum pa can goms par bya ste /
translated: For that, one who wishes to perform transference should first practice the vase-breathing.

original: des ni sgo rnams thams cad du rlung rengs pa 'gro ba bcom par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des ni sgo rnams thams cad du rlung rengs pa 'gro ba bcom par 'gyur ro //
translated: By that, the winds in all the doors are arrested, and the movement is destroyed.

original: 'on kyang sa bon rnams kyis sgo rnams bu ga med par btsir bar bya zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'on kyang sa bon rnams kyis sgo rnams bu ga med par btsir bar bya zhes gsungs pa /
translated: But the seeds should be pressed with the doors closed.

original: lnga zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lnga zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The five, etc.

original: mgo bo dang lag pa dang rkang pa ste /
analyzed: mgo bo dang lag pa dang rkang pa ste /
translated: The head, arms, and legs.

original: 'bur ba lnga rnams 'di la yod do zhes pa 'bur po lnga can te lus so //
analyzed: 'bur ba lnga rnams 'di la yod do zhes pa 'bur po lnga can te lus so //
translated: This has five protuberances, thus it is the five-protuberance body.

original: de'i mchod rten ni mgo bo dang de'i sgo gser gyi sgo dang smin ma'i dbus so //
analyzed: de'i mchod rten ni mgo bo dang de'i sgo gser gyi sgo dang smin ma'i dbus so //
translated: Its stupa is the head, and its golden door is the middle of the eyebrows.

original: de'i bu gar sgom pa ste /
analyzed: de'i bu gar sgom pa ste /
translated: One should meditate on its door.

original: kshum yig dang h'um yig go zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: kshum yig dang h'um yig go zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: The syllable kṣuṃ and the syllable hūṃ are the remainder.

original: de la gser gyi sgor kshum yig ste /
analyzed: de la gser gyi sgor kshum yig ste /
translated: There, the golden door is the syllable kṣuṃ.

original: de'i 'og tu h'um bsgom mo //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu h'um bsgom mo //
translated: Below that, one should meditate on the hūṃ.

original: smin ma'i dbus sgor ni h'um dang / de'i nang du bde ba chen po'i chu skyes kyi lte bar ham ngo //
analyzed: smin ma'i dbus sgor ni h'um dang / de'i nang du bde ba chen po'i chu skyes kyi lte bar ham ngo //
translated: In the door of the middle of the eyebrows, there is the hūṃ, and inside that, in the center of the lotus of great bliss, is the haṃ.

original: mchod rten de'i 'og gi sgo lce'i rtsa ba dang mgrin pa'i bu ga @277a * //
analyzed: mchod rten de'i 'og gi sgo lce'i rtsa ba dang mgrin pa'i bu ga @277a * //
translated: The door below that stupa is the root of the tongue and the throat.

original: ste ; de dag gi sa bon sum dang / sm+r+yum chu ltar dkar po ste /
analyzed: ste ; de dag gi sa bon sum dang / sm+r+yum chu ltar dkar po ste /
translated: Their seeds are the suṃ and the smṛṃ, white like water.

original: de rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of their purification.

original: btung dang btung min gyi'am /
analyzed: btung dang btung min gyi'am /
translated: to be drunk or not to be drunk.

original: de'i lte lte ba'i sgo'i me'i sa bon kshm+r+yum 'bar ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: de'i lte lte ba'i sgo'i me'i sa bon kshm+r+yum 'bar ba lta bu'o //
translated: The seed of fire in the door of the navel is like a blazing kṣa.

original: gsungs zin pa 'di rnams dang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sa bon rnams snga ma'i bum pa can gyi 'brel ba can rnams te /
analyzed: gsungs zin pa 'di rnams dang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sa bon rnams snga ma'i bum pa can gyi 'brel ba can rnams te /
translated: These seeds that have been mentioned and those that will be mentioned are related to the previous vase-breathing,

original: lhan cig byed pa /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa /
translated: and are the co-operating conditions.

original: nyid kyis bsgom mo zhes pa rlung 'ching ba ni 'di rnams kyi dgongs pa'o zhes mngon par dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: nyid kyis bsgom mo zhes pa rlung 'ching ba ni 'di rnams kyi dgongs pa'o zhes mngon par dgongs pa'o //
translated: The intention is that one should meditate on them oneself.

original: rlung gi mdog can sngon po lus h'um yig ni /
analyzed: rlung gi mdog can sngon po lus h'um yig ni /
translated: The body is the color of wind, blue, and the syllable hūṃ is in the body.

original: rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i sems kyi sgom ste /
analyzed: rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i sems kyi sgom ste /
translated: The meditation of the mind is the pure wind maṇḍala.

original: mig dag la'o ;
analyzed: mig dag la'o ;
translated: In the eyes.

original: / h'um gi sa bon 'di ni 'pho ba la sogs pas dkar po kho na'o //
analyzed: / h'um gi sa bon 'di ni 'pho ba la sogs pas dkar po kho na'o //
translated: This seed of hūṃ is white only by the transference, etc.

original: 'di dang sa bon gzhan rnams kyi yang sngon po nyid ni las gzhan la kha dog gzhan nyid nye bar mtshan to //
analyzed: 'di dang sa bon gzhan rnams kyi yang sngon po nyid ni las gzhan la kha dog gzhan nyid nye bar mtshan to //
translated: The blueness of this and the other seeds is indicated by another color for another activity.

original: rlung gi sa bon ni yum yig go //
analyzed: rlung gi sa bon ni yum yig go //
translated: The seed of wind is the syllable y.

original: gang gi phyir de'i rtsa ba rnams ni rlung gi rtsa ba ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de'i rtsa ba rnams ni rlung gi rtsa ba ste /
translated: Because its roots are the roots of wind.

original: de'i sa bon gyi rtsa ba can no ;
analyzed: de'i sa bon gyi rtsa ba can no ;
translated: It has the root of a seed.

original: / rtsa ba ci zhe na rlung ste /
analyzed: / rtsa ba ci zhe na rlung ste /
translated: What is the root? Wind.🔽Like a seed, sprout, and so on, the continuum of effect and cause is beginningless.

original: sa bon dang myu gu la sogs pa bzhin rnams te 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po'i rgyun thog ma med pa'o zhes thams cad pa'i rigs pa mtshon pa zhar la byung ba'o //
analyzed: sa bon dang myu gu la sogs pa bzhin rnams te 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po'i rgyun thog ma med pa'o zhes thams cad pa'i rigs pa mtshon pa zhar la byung ba'o //
translated: This is the indication of the reasoning of the all-base, which is a digression.

original: de yang thig le dang n'a da dag dang au yig dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: de yang thig le dang n'a da dag dang au yig dang ldan pa ste /
translated: That is also endowed with the drop and nāda and the letter oṃ.

original: de'i phyir yum gyi sa bon rna bdag dang sna bug dag la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir yum gyi sa bon rna bdag dang sna bug dag la bsgom pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the seed of the mother is meditated on in the nose and the nostrils.

original: des dang gzhan rnams kyis te /
analyzed: des dang gzhan rnams kyis te /
translated: By that and others,

original: sems kyis yongs su bsgoms pa nyid kyi phyir sems kyi sa bon rnams kyis dgug par bya zhing nad du gzhug ste /
analyzed: sems kyis yongs su bsgoms pa nyid kyi phyir sems kyi sa bon rnams kyis dgug par bya zhing nad du gzhug ste /
translated: because of being fully meditated by the mind, the seeds of the mind are summoned and placed in the body.

original: rlung dgag par bya zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rlung dgag par bya zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the wind is blocked.

original: rdo rje ma zhes pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang seng ge ma ste /
analyzed: rdo rje ma zhes pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang seng ge ma ste /
translated: Vajrī means Vajraḍāka and Siṃha.

original: de dag gi sa bon dag ni sum dang sm+r+yum ste de dag kha la mdor bstan pa dag gi rgyas par bstan pa 'di'o //
analyzed: de dag gi sa bon dag ni sum dang sm+r+yum ste de dag kha la mdor bstan pa dag gi rgyas par bstan pa 'di'o //
translated: The seeds of those are suṃ and suṃ. Those are the extensive explanations of the concise explanations in the mouth.

original: 'jigs ma'i sa bon ni kshum ste /
analyzed: 'jigs ma'i sa bon ni kshum ste /
translated: The seed of Bhairava is kṣuṃ.

original: de tshangs pa'i sgor bsgom pa rgyas par bstan pa 'di'o //
analyzed: de tshangs pa'i sgor bsgom pa rgyas par bstan pa 'di'o //
translated: That is the extensive explanation of the meditation in the aperture of Brahmā.

original: de ltar rnam par bsgoms te /
analyzed: de ltar rnam par bsgoms te /
translated: Having meditated in that way,

original: lcags kyu la sogs zhes pa'o //
analyzed: lcags kyu la sogs zhes pa'o //
translated: the hook, and so on.

original: 'di rgyas par ston te /
analyzed: 'di rgyas par ston te /
translated: This is the extensive explanation.

original: 'jigs ma zhes pa gtum mo'i lte bar te /
analyzed: 'jigs ma zhes pa gtum mo'i lte bar te /
translated: Bhairava is in the center of caṇḍālī.

original: kun du rtog pa mtha' dag bsregs pas bya dka' ba nyid kyis na mos pa chung ba rnams skrag pa'i gnas nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: kun du rtog pa mtha' dag bsregs pas bya dka' ba nyid kyis na mos pa chung ba rnams skrag pa'i gnas nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Since all conceptual thoughts are burned, it is difficult to do, because it is a place of fear for those of little interest.

original: de'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyu lta bus dgong pa la sogs pas bkug pa zhes pa bkug pa'i brten pa rnams @277b kyis rten la nye bar btags pa las sgo dgu dang snying ga'i rlung rnams kyis so //
