analyzed: dri ma med pa nyid yongs su dag pa nyid 'dren no zhes pa tshul gang du yin pa de ni de skad do //
translated: is stainless, pure, and leads to complete purity, that is the way it is.

original: gtsang ba nyid do //
analyzed: gtsang ba nyid do //
translated: It is pure.

original: so so'i skye bo nyid la rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i de kho na nyid la lhag par mos pa las de'i rgyu can dang de'i rang bzhin thams cad dag byed kho na yin na /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo nyid la rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i de kho na nyid la lhag par mos pa las de'i rgyu can dang de'i rang bzhin thams cad dag byed kho na yin na /
translated: In the case of an ordinary being, the cause of that and its nature are all purifiers, because of the conviction in the natural purity of reality.

original: dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i de kho na nyid rtogs pa na ni bcom ldan 'das dang / de 'dzin pa rnams kyi shin tu ches dag byed nyid do zhes mngon par dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i de kho na nyid rtogs pa na ni bcom ldan 'das dang / de 'dzin pa rnams kyi shin tu ches dag byed nyid do zhes mngon par dgongs pa'o //
translated: Thus it is intended.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: For that very reason, it is said:

original: gnas zhes pa brtan pa ste /
analyzed: gnas zhes pa brtan pa ste /
translated: Place means stable,

original: mi g-yo zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: mi g-yo zhes pa'i don to //
translated: the meaning of immovable.

original: gang gi phyir rnam pa 'di lta bu kho na dag byed yin pa de'i phyir mchod bya ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rnam pa 'di lta bu kho na dag byed yin pa de'i phyir mchod bya ste /
translated: Because it is just this kind of purity, therefore it is to be worshipped,

original: bcom ldan 'das la bde ba chen po'i mchod pas so zhes pa skabs su bab pa nye bar bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la bde ba chen po'i mchod pas so zhes pa skabs su bab pa nye bar bsdu ba'o //
translated: with the worship of great bliss to the Blessed One. This is the appropriate summary.

original: pir la zhes pa pir te /
analyzed: pir la zhes pa pir te /
translated: With the brush means with the brush.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas /
translated: Endowed with the yoga of Vajrasattva,

original: gtor ma dang mchod pa la sogs pa sngon ma can pir bzung nas rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po'i sngags kyis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig mngon par bsngags te sbyin no //
analyzed: gtor ma dang mchod pa la sogs pa sngon ma can pir bzung nas rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po'i sngags kyis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig mngon par bsngags te sbyin no //
translated: having taken up the brush, having consecrated it twenty-one times with the essence mantra of Vajrasattva, one should give it.

original: bzo bo rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su bsgoms pa la yi ge gsum gyi snying ga dang mgrin pa dang spyi bor byin gyis brlabs pa'i lag par gnas pa'i zla ba la pir rdo rje'i rnam pa can dang / tshon yang padmar gnas pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rnam pa can du lhag par mos te /
analyzed: bzo bo rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su bsgoms pa la yi ge gsum gyi snying ga dang mgrin pa dang spyi bor byin gyis brlabs pa'i lag par gnas pa'i zla ba la pir rdo rje'i rnam pa can dang / tshon yang padmar gnas pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rnam pa can du lhag par mos te /
translated: The artist, visualizing himself as Vajrasattva, empowers his hand, which rests on the moon, with the three seed syllables at the heart, throat, and head. He imagines that the brush is in the form of a vajra on the moon and that the colors are in the form of the elixir of wisdom on a lotus.

original: de'i rjes su bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes su bri bar bya'o //
translated: Then he should draw.

original: 'bri smyug ni shes rab ye shes kyi rang gi ngo bor lhag par mos nas shes pa kho na khyad par te /
analyzed: 'bri smyug ni shes rab ye shes kyi rang gi ngo bor lhag par mos nas shes pa kho na khyad par te /
translated: The pen is imagined to be the nature of the wisdom of the wisdom consort initiation. The difference is only in the awareness.

original: gzhan snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is the same as before.

original: legs par gsal ba'i lo 'dab ni legs par brdungs pa'i lo 'dab bo //
analyzed: legs par gsal ba'i lo 'dab ni legs par brdungs pa'i lo 'dab bo //
translated: The well-defined leaves are well-beaten leaves.

original: t'a la'i 'dab ma'o zhes kha cig go //
analyzed: t'a la'i 'dab ma'o zhes kha cig go //
translated: Some say they are palm leaves.

original: legs par brkyang pa'i 'dab ma zhes kha cig tu 'don to //
analyzed: legs par brkyang pa'i 'dab ma zhes kha cig tu 'don to //
translated: Some say they are well-extended leaves.

original: sbrang chen zhes pa mi'i mar khu'o //
analyzed: sbrang chen zhes pa mi'i mar khu'o //
translated: The great honey is human marrow.

original: dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel ba /
analyzed: dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel ba /
translated: The Commentary on the Glorious Union Tantra

original: man ngag gi snye mar snye ma sum cu lnga pa'o /
analyzed: man ngag gi snye mar snye ma sum cu lnga pa'o /
translated: In the Cluster of Instructions, this is the thirty-fifth cluster.

original: // / yang dang yang du rnal 'byor goms pas dbang du gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams nus pa @302b nye bar ston pa la grub pa'i dus su yang rdo rje sgeg mo rnams la rol par gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / yang dang yang du rnal 'byor goms pas dbang du gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams nus pa @302b nye bar ston pa la grub pa'i dus su yang rdo rje sgeg mo rnams la rol par gsungs pa /
translated: The yogis and yoginis who have become powerful through repeated practice of yoga are said to play with the vajra maidens at the time of accomplishment, in order to demonstrate their ability.

original: nyon zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nyon zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Listen, etc.

original: yang dag sbyor bcom ldan 'das 'dis mtshon par bya'o zhes pa yang dag sbyor mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: yang dag sbyor bcom ldan 'das 'dis mtshon par bya'o zhes pa yang dag sbyor mtshan nyid do //
translated: The characteristic of the perfect union is that this Bhagavān is to be illustrated.

original: de kho na la 'di 'dra ba'i rol mo srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de kho na la 'di 'dra ba'i rol mo srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because such a play is possible in reality.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i'o zhes pa'i sogs pas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i'o zhes pa'i sogs pas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i'o //
translated: Of Vajradhara, etc. The “etc.” includes Vairochana, etc.

original: 'di ltar zhes pa la sogs pa rol mo ste 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes pa la sogs pa rol mo ste 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o //
translated: The play is like this, etc. The “etc.” includes the king of desire.

original: rdo rje can ni shi ri kha nda'i shing ngo //
analyzed: rdo rje can ni shi ri kha nda'i shing ngo //
translated: The vajra is the shirishanda tree.

original: bcu gnyis ni ring pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: bcu gnyis ni ring pa nyid du'o //
translated: Twelve is long.

original: gzhan pa ni thung ba nang dang ldan pa'i cang te'u'o //
analyzed: gzhan pa ni thung ba nang dang ldan pa'i cang te'u'o //
translated: The other is short, with a hollow hand drum.

original: bud med khrag ni me tog ste des chu skyes bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: bud med khrag ni me tog ste des chu skyes bri bar bya'o //
translated: The blood of a woman is the flower, and with it one should draw the lotus.

original: de la mandala gru bzhi pa'i dbus su rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs su gnas pas 'dab chags chu skyar gyi rkang pa bzhin du steng du byas pa'i rkang pa g-yon pa'i rting pas 'gugs pa'i tshul gyis che ge mo a'a ka rsha y'a mi khe ma h'um zhes
analyzed: de la mandala gru bzhi pa'i dbus su rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs su gnas pas 'dab chags chu skyar gyi rkang pa bzhin du steng du byas pa'i rkang pa g-yon pa'i rting pas 'gugs pa'i tshul gyis che ge mo a'a ka rsha y'a mi khe ma h'um zhes
translated: In the center of a square maṇḍala, one should stand in the form of Vajradhara, and with one’s left foot drawn up like the foot of a flying curlew, one should recite, “May such and such be summoned, Oṃ ākarṣaya hūṃ,”

original: bsgyings pa dang bcas pa brjod cing de de'i rkang pa'i 'og tu gnas pa dkyil 'khor du gdung bar bya'o //
analyzed: bsgyings pa dang bcas pa brjod cing de de'i rkang pa'i 'og tu gnas pa dkyil 'khor du gdung bar bya'o //
translated: and with a swagger, and he will be under one’s control, standing under one’s foot, tormented in the maṇḍala.

original: nga ngag  ces pa nga'i ngag go //
analyzed: nga ngag  ces pa nga'i ngag go //
translated: “My speech” means “my speech.”

original: gal te zhes pa dngos grub 'gor bar gyur na bskul ba'i tshigs bcad gsungs pa /
analyzed: gal te zhes pa dngos grub 'gor bar gyur na bskul ba'i tshigs bcad gsungs pa /
translated: If the accomplishment is delayed, one should recite the verse of urging:

original: mdzes zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mdzes zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “O beautiful one, etc.”

original: kye khro bo sngon po mdzes pa khyod de /
analyzed: kye khro bo sngon po mdzes pa khyod de /
translated: O beautiful blue wrathful one, you!

original: khyed kyi dam tshig la bya ba can te /
analyzed: khyed kyi dam tshig la bya ba can te /
translated: You are the one who acts in accordance with your pledge.

original: phyag gis ni dbyug pa nor bu rnams kyis bcings pa 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyag gis ni dbyug pa nor bu rnams kyis bcings pa 'dzin to //
translated: With your hand you hold a club bound with jewels.

original: dpa' bo bdag 'du ba la 'khrugs pas brdeg pa la sogs pa yongs su spong ste dor cig pa'o //
analyzed: dpa' bo bdag 'du ba la 'khrugs pas brdeg pa la sogs pa yongs su spong ste dor cig pa'o //
translated: The hero should avoid, i.e., give up, the disturbance of the assembly, i.e., striking, etc.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i dbus su khyod do khyod ni blta ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i dbus su khyod do khyod ni blta ste /
translated: You are in the middle of the yoginis, i.e., you are seen.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bdag kyang zhugs te khyod la padmas mchod par bya zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bdag kyang zhugs te khyod la padmas mchod par bya zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: I also enter into the middle of the mandala of yoginis, and with the lotus, i.e., with the hand gesture of the lotus, I worship you.

original: de nas sgo ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong du 'jug pa'i thabs bde ba chen po'o //
analyzed: de nas sgo ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong du 'jug pa'i thabs bde ba chen po'o //
translated: Then, the door is the means of entering the city of non-abiding nirvana, which is great bliss.

original: khrol ni grol bar mdzod ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: khrol ni grol bar mdzod ces pa'i don to //
translated: The word “open” means “open up.”

original: des 'khor ba las sgrol ba ste grol bar bgyi'o //🔽tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang slob ma dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dus su dang / tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dus su yang sgo srung la @303a * //
analyzed: des 'khor ba las sgrol ba ste grol bar bgyi'o // tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang slob ma dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dus su dang / tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dus su yang sgo srung la @303a * //
translated: By that, one is liberated from samsara, i.e., one is made free.

original: gsol ba gdab pa'i ched du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gsol ba gdab pa'i ched du brjod par bya'o //
translated: This verse should also be recited by the disciple at the time of entering the mandala, and at the time of entering the ganacakra mandala, for the purpose of supplicating the doorkeeper.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa nyon cig ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa nyon cig ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said, “Listen,” etc.

original: bdud rtsi ni bdud rtsir byas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lnga'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: bdud rtsi ni bdud rtsir byas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lnga'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The nectar is the nature of the five nectars and the five lamps.

original: kla klo ni brda'o //
analyzed: kla klo ni brda'o //
translated: The barbarian is the sign.

original: sbrang chang dang rgun 'brum chang ni dpa' bo gcig pa'o ;
analyzed: sbrang chang dang rgun 'brum chang ni dpa' bo gcig pa'o ;
translated: The honey wine and grape wine are the single hero.

original: / nya phyis ni tsu kra ste rtsub pa'i 'dod can ma'o //
analyzed: / nya phyis ni tsu kra ste rtsub pa'i 'dod can ma'o //
translated: The oyster is the cakra, the passionate woman.

original: k'a nydzi ka zhes pa k'a nydzi ka'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: k'a nydzi ka zhes pa k'a nydzi ka'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: The kāñjikā is the fruit of the kāñjikā.

original: dga' ba zhes pa rnam pa 'di lta bu'i dga' ba'i dngos po nye bar longs spyad pas skal pa bzang ba kun dga' dang bcas pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su rnal 'byor pa 'grub bo /
analyzed: dga' ba zhes pa rnam pa 'di lta bu'i dga' ba'i dngos po nye bar longs spyad pas skal pa bzang ba kun dga' dang bcas pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su rnal 'byor pa 'grub bo /
translated: The one who is delighted is the yogi who, by enjoying the things that are the cause of such delight, becomes the glorious Vajrasattva, who is fortunate and has delight.

original: mgu ba yang glu len pa la sogs pa byed de /
analyzed: mgu ba yang glu len pa la sogs pa byed de /
translated: The one who is pleased sings songs and so forth.

original: de la glu ni ka zhes pa la sogs pa kam dzdza hi hi zhes pa'i mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: de la glu ni ka zhes pa la sogs pa kam dzdza hi hi zhes pa'i mthar thug pa'o //
translated: The song is from the syllable ka up to the syllable kam, jja, and hi.

original: de ltar gzhan yang de kho na nyid kyi don kun nas rtogs pas /
analyzed: de ltar gzhan yang de kho na nyid kyi don kun nas rtogs pas /
translated: Thus, moreover, by fully understanding the meaning of reality,

original: dor de sgrib pa rnams gang gi bsal ba de kun dor te rdo rje'i glu zhes pa'i don to ;
analyzed: dor de sgrib pa rnams gang gi bsal ba de kun dor te rdo rje'i glu zhes pa'i don to ;
translated: That garment is the removal of all obscurations, which is the meaning of “vajra song.”

original: / phyag rgya dang rdo rje'i rkang stabs rnams ni rgyud gzhan du gsungs so //
analyzed: / phyag rgya dang rdo rje'i rkang stabs rnams ni rgyud gzhan du gsungs so //
translated: The mudras and vajra steps are taught in other tantras.

original: gang las lta stangs zhes pa la sogs pa ni de nye bar mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: gang las lta stangs zhes pa la sogs pa ni de nye bar mtshon pa ste /
translated: “ Gaze” and so forth are illustrated by that.

original: de rnams kyang rdo rje phreng bar rgyas pa dang bcas par rnam par phye'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyang rdo rje phreng bar rgyas pa dang bcas par rnam par phye'o //
translated: Those are also analyzed in detail in the Vajra Garland.

original: sgyug mo ni sgyug mo nyid do //
analyzed: sgyug mo ni sgyug mo nyid do //
translated: “ Mother-in-law” is a mother-in-law.

original: sgyug mo can zhes klog pa la yang de ltar ro //
analyzed: sgyug mo can zhes klog pa la yang de ltar ro //
translated: “ Mother-in-law” is also read as “having a mother-in-law.”

original: de rnams kyi ni de rnams so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi ni de rnams so //
translated: “ Their” refers to those.

original: bzang po ni rma med pa'o //
analyzed: bzang po ni rma med pa'o //
translated: “ Good” means without wounds.

original: don ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: don ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The meaning is as follows.

original: dben zhing yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i bla ma shes rab ma dang bcas pa dang / de bzhin du de las gzhan pa rnams kyang dbang bskur zhing lha'i rnal 'byor can rnams rgan rim du gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: dben zhing yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i bla ma shes rab ma dang bcas pa dang / de bzhin du de las gzhan pa rnams kyang dbang bskur zhing lha'i rnal 'byor can rnams rgan rim du gzhag par bya'o //
translated: In a solitary place that is agreeable to the mind, the guru endowed with deity yoga, together with the wisdom woman, and likewise the others as well, should be installed in the order of seniority, conferred empowerment, and endowed with deity yoga.

original: sgrub pa pos skal med rnams spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa pos skal med rnams spang bar bya'o //
translated: The adept should avoid those who are unfortunate.

original: bla ma la gus shing bag yod pa can las kyi rdo rje bya'o //
analyzed: bla ma la gus shing bag yod pa can las kyi rdo rje bya'o //
translated: One should be a vajra of action, respectful to the guru and heedful.

original: gtor ma dang po dang bar ba dang tha mar sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: gtor ma dang po dang bar ba dang tha mar sbyin par bya'o //
translated: One should give the sacrificial cake at the beginning, in the middle, and at the end.

original: tshogs kyi gtso bos kyang bza' bya dang btung bya la sogs pa bdud rtsir bya'o //
analyzed: tshogs kyi gtso bos kyang bza' bya dang btung bya la sogs pa bdud rtsir bya'o //
translated: The chief of the assembly should also make the food and drink, etc., into nectar.

original: myos byed kyi chos 'byung byas par rang gi snying ga'i 'od kyis spyan drangs pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo cho ga ji lta bar tshim par bya'o //
analyzed: myos byed kyi chos 'byung byas par rang gi snying ga'i 'od kyis spyan drangs pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo cho ga ji lta bar tshim par bya'o //
translated: Having invited the wisdom wheel, which is made into the intoxicating substance of the source of phenomena, with light from one's heart, one should satisfy it according to the rite.

original: de la nyis 'gyur sbyin par bya //
analyzed: de la nyis 'gyur sbyin par bya //
translated: One should give it twice as much.

original: sngags pa gzhan la mnyam po nyid //
analyzed: sngags pa gzhan la mnyam po nyid //
translated: One should be impartial to other mantra practitioners.

original: bla ma la snod gnyis te /
analyzed: bla ma la snod gnyis te /
translated: There are two vessels for the guru:

original: gzhan rnams la @303b re re'o //
analyzed: gzhan rnams la @303b re re'o //
translated: one for each of the others.

original: snod ni shin tu skam mi bya //
analyzed: snod ni shin tu skam mi bya //
translated: The vessel should not be made too dry.

original: de bzhin shin tu bkang mi bya /🔽padma'i bskor bas /
analyzed: de bzhin shin tu bkang mi bya / padma'i bskor bas /
translated: Likewise, it should not be filled too much.🔽One should turn the vessel with the left hand,

original: padma'i lag pas blang ba dang / de nyid kyi ni lag pas dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: padma'i lag pas blang ba dang / de nyid kyi ni lag pas dbul bar bya'o //
translated: and take it with the lotus hand, and offer it with that same hand.

original: sa la bka' med par 'dug na chad pa sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: sa la bka' med par 'dug na chad pa sbyin par bya'o //
translated: If there is no order, then one should give a punishment.

original: phyag byas pa kho nas 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la dbul te blang ba 'ang ngo //
analyzed: phyag byas pa kho nas 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la dbul te blang ba 'ang ngo //
translated: Having made obeisance, one should offer oneself to the Lord of the Wheel.🔽Song, dance, likewise music,

original: glu gar de bzhin rol mo dang // dri dang lan dang legs smra ba //
analyzed: glu gar de bzhin rol mo dang // dri dang lan dang legs smra ba //
translated: scent, reply, and speaking well,

original: 'khor lo can gyi rjes gnang med //
analyzed: 'khor lo can gyi rjes gnang med //
translated: without permission of the one with the wheel,

original: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du mi bya //
analyzed: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du mi bya //
translated: one should not do these in the gaṇacakra.

original: lha yi rnal 'byor lhur len pas //
analyzed: lha yi rnal 'byor lhur len pas //
translated: One who is devoted to the yoga of the deity

original: dal bus thams cad bya'o //
analyzed: dal bus thams cad bya'o //
translated: should do everything slowly.🔽Otherwise, how could there be spiritual power from drinking too much, from being unconscious, or from a distracted mind?

original: gzhan du na shin tu 'thungs pa las brgyal ba shin tu shes pa med pa las sam sems rnam par g-yengs pa las dngos grub ga la zhig /'gro bar 'dod pas 'khor lo'i gtso bo la phyag byas te /
analyzed: gzhan du na shin tu 'thungs pa las brgyal ba shin tu shes pa med pa las sam sems rnam par g-yengs pa las dngos grub ga la zhig /'gro bar 'dod pas 'khor lo'i gtso bo la phyag byas te /
translated: Desiring to leave, one should make obeisance to the chief of the wheel,

original: zhus nas 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhus nas 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: and having requested permission, one should leave.

original: zos pa'i lhag ma'i gtor ma ji ltar bcug pa'i sngags rnams kyis sbyin par bya ste /
analyzed: zos pa'i lhag ma'i gtor ma ji ltar bcug pa'i sngags rnams kyis sbyin par bya ste /
translated: One should give the remainder of the food, the bali offering, with the mantras as they were placed.

original: aom a'a: au tstshi shta badzr'a dhi ti shtha /
analyzed: aom a'a: au tstshi shta badzr'a dhi ti shtha /
translated: Oṃ āḥ ucchiṣṭa vajra ādhiṣṭhita.

original: ai mam ba li gri hna gri hna h'um phat ces pa 'di yang na'o //
analyzed: ai mam ba li gri hna gri hna h'um phat ces pa 'di yang na'o //
translated: This is also imma bali grihṇa grihṇa hūṃ phaṭ.

original: 'dir gal te bla ma las gzhan rnams la shes rab ma med pa de'i tshe dpa' bo'i ston mor brjod par bya'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir gal te bla ma las gzhan rnams la shes rab ma med pa de'i tshe dpa' bo'i ston mor brjod par bya'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni ma yin no //
translated: Here, if there is no wisdom consort other than the guru, then it is called heroic feast, but not gaṇacakra.

original: bla ma la ni dpa' bo'i ston mo la yang phyag rgya nges par dbul bar bya ste bsod nams 'phel ba'i ched du'o //
analyzed: bla ma la ni dpa' bo'i ston mo la yang phyag rgya nges par dbul bar bya ste bsod nams 'phel ba'i ched du'o //
translated: But for the guru, even in the heroic feast, a consort must definitely be offered, for the sake of increasing merit.

original: de ltar / 'khor lor yon bcas ston mo ni //
analyzed: de ltar / 'khor lor yon bcas ston mo ni //
translated: Thus: The feast with offerings in the wheel

original: ngan 'gro 'jig par byed byas nas //
analyzed: ngan 'gro 'jig par byed byas nas //
translated: having been performed, which destroys the lower realms,

original: ji ltar nus pas yon phul te //
analyzed: ji ltar nus pas yon phul te //
translated: having offered gifts according to one's ability,

original: tshogs kyi 'khor lo gshegs su gsol //
analyzed: tshogs kyi 'khor lo gshegs su gsol //
translated: the gaṇacakra is requested to depart.

original: zhes pa'o // rol mo dang glu dang gar dang phyag rgya'i bya ba'i de kho na nyid bzhi rnams kyis gsal ba'o zhes pa bya ba'i de kho na nyid bzhi'i rgyal po'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // rol mo dang glu dang gar dang phyag rgya'i bya ba'i de kho na nyid bzhi rnams kyis gsal ba'o zhes pa bya ba'i de kho na nyid bzhi'i rgyal po'o //
translated: This is the king of the four realities of action, which are clarified by the four realities of music, song, dance, and consort.

original: rnams dbye phyis pa ni lung ngo //
analyzed: rnams dbye phyis pa ni lung ngo //
translated: The division of the realities is scripture.

original: dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel ba /
analyzed: dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel ba /
translated: The Commentary on the Glorious Compendium of Practice Tantra.

original: man ngag gi snye mar snye ma sum cu drug pa'o /
analyzed: man ngag gi snye mar snye ma sum cu drug pa'o /
translated: This is the thirty-sixth flower from the Bouquet of Instructions.

original: // / sngar gsungs pa'i spyod pa spyad pa dang ldan pa rnal 'byor cher 'phel ba la dbang du gyur pas phyag rgya dang lhan cig kho nas phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub bo zhes brjod pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / sngar gsungs pa'i spyod pa spyad pa dang ldan pa rnal 'byor cher 'phel ba la dbang du gyur pas phyag rgya dang lhan cig kho nas phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub bo zhes brjod pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: For the sake of stating that one who possesses the practice of the previously explained conduct and is powerful in the increase of yoga will attain the great seal of the great seal only together with the seal, it is said:

original: nyon zhes pa la sogs pa ste /🔽rdo rje slob dpon ni 'dir rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs kyis mthar @304a * //
analyzed: nyon zhes pa la sogs pa ste / rdo rje slob dpon ni 'dir rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs kyis mthar @304a * //
translated: “Listen, Vajra Holder,” and so on.

original: thug par 'jug pa nyi ma bdun pa'i lhar blta bar bya ba'i cho gas gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: thug par 'jug pa nyi ma bdun pa'i lhar blta bar bya ba'i cho gas gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: Here the vajra master is the yogin who abides by the method of seeing the seven suns that enter into the form of Vajra Holder at the end.

original: de'i dngos grub kyi ched du bya ba'i dam tshig kun spyod de rjes su sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dngos grub kyi ched du bya ba'i dam tshig kun spyod de rjes su sgrub pa'o //
translated: The conduct of the commitments for the sake of his attainment is the practice.

original: 'khor lo chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: 'khor lo chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The great wheel is the mandala of Vajrasattva.

original: dang po ni dam tshig sems dpa'i gzugs so //
analyzed: dang po ni dam tshig sems dpa'i gzugs so //
translated: The first is the form of the commitment being.

original: de la rab tu zhugs pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor ni ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs so //🔽de ltar rang nyid dang por rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin can gyi bdag nyid la /
analyzed: de la rab tu zhugs pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor ni ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs so // de ltar rang nyid dang por rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin can gyi bdag nyid la /
translated: The “mandala of the essence of the one who has entered it” is the form of the gnosis being.🔽Thus, first of all, one should imagine oneself to be endowed with the consecration, etc.,

original: rang nyid kyi dbang bskur sogs rgyas pa ji skad bshad pa rnams dang ldan par brtag cing bsam nas 'grub po zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: rang nyid kyi dbang bskur sogs rgyas pa ji skad bshad pa rnams dang ldan par brtag cing bsam nas 'grub po zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: as explained, in the nature of Vajrasattva, and then one will be successful.

original: de gsungs pa rdo rje slob dpon nyid ces pa rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: de gsungs pa rdo rje slob dpon nyid ces pa rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: That is stated: “the master himself is Vajrasattva.”

original: ci las she na gang phyir legs thos ni rnam par thos shing legs par rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: ci las she na gang phyir legs thos ni rnam par thos shing legs par rtogs pa ste /
translated: From what? “Because he has heard well” and understood well,

original: tshad mas 'thad pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: tshad mas 'thad pa nyid kyis so //
translated: by means of valid cognition.

original: ci zhe na bsam gtan zhes pa la sogs pa 'gro zhes pa'i bar ro //
analyzed: ci zhe na bsam gtan zhes pa la sogs pa 'gro zhes pa'i bar ro //
translated: What? “Meditation,” etc., up to “he should go.”

original: gang yun ring du bar ma chad par gus pas sems par byed pa de'i tshe bsam gtan rab tu gyur pa mthar phyin pa gsal bar snang bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang yun ring du bar ma chad par gus pas sems par byed pa de'i tshe bsam gtan rab tu gyur pa mthar phyin pa gsal bar snang bar 'gyur te /
translated: When one thinks respectfully and uninterruptedly for a long time, then the perfection of meditation, the clear appearance, will occur.

original: dper na 'dod pa can gyis 'dod ldan ma sems pa bzhin /
analyzed: dper na 'dod pa can gyis 'dod ldan ma sems pa bzhin /
translated: For example, like a lustful man who is not thinking about a lustful woman.

original: mchog gi skyes bu don du gnyer bas kyang rim pa gnyis bsam gtan par byed do //
analyzed: mchog gi skyes bu don du gnyer bas kyang rim pa gnyis bsam gtan par byed do //
translated: And also, a person who is seeking a supreme person should meditate on the two stages.

original: de'i phyir the tshom ga la yod /
analyzed: de'i phyir the tshom ga la yod /
translated: Therefore, how can there be doubt?

original: rim pa gnyis bsgom bzhin pa yang stong pa nyid kyi chos sgom pa lhur len pa'i mthar thug pa'i bya ba can kho na dngos grub kyi rgyu'o zhes ston to //🔽rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rim pa gnyis bsgom bzhin pa yang stong pa nyid kyi chos sgom pa lhur len pa'i mthar thug pa'i bya ba can kho na dngos grub kyi rgyu'o zhes ston to // rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa la /
translated: And also, one who is meditating on the two stages is only one who is intent on cultivating the doctrine of emptiness, and the ultimate activity is the cause of power.🔽It is taught.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' ni dam tshig sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' ni dam tshig sems dpa' ste /
translated: The vajra being is the commitment being.

original: snying po ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
analyzed: snying po ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
translated: The essence is the wisdom being.

original: sogs pas dbang bskur la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sogs pas dbang bskur la sogs pa'o //
translated: The “etc.” includes the consecration, and so on.

original: de rnams kyis mtshon par bya'o zhes pa mtshon bya ste rang bzhin med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de rnams kyis mtshon par bya'o zhes pa mtshon bya ste rang bzhin med pa nyid do //
translated: Those are the “illustrators,” which is to say, the very absence of intrinsic reality.

original: de bzlas pa ni sgom par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de bzlas pa ni sgom par byed pa'o //
translated: The “recitation” of those is the cultivation.

original: chos goms pa kho na 'khor ba sel bar 'gro bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: chos goms pa kho na 'khor ba sel bar 'gro bar byed pa ste /
translated: The very cultivation of the doctrine is what goes to the removal of cyclic existence.

original: chos can bsgom pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos can bsgom pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The cultivation of a subject is not.

original: 'dod ldan ma'i lus bsgom pas 'dod chags zum par byed pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dod ldan ma'i lus bsgom pas 'dod chags zum par byed pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The body of a passionate woman is not meditated upon in order to extinguish passion.🔽Rather, it is in terms of impermanence, etc.

original: 'on kyang mi rtag pa la sogs pa nyid du'o zhes pa la sogs pa gzhan du mang po gsungs so //
analyzed: 'on kyang mi rtag pa la sogs pa nyid du'o zhes pa la sogs pa gzhan du mang po gsungs so //
translated: Thus, it is stated elsewhere.🔽The recitation of the essence-mantra of Vajradhara, etc.,🔽performed previously, becomes a branch of the means of achieving power.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i snying po'i sngags la @304b sogs pa rnams kyis bzlas pa sngar byas pa ni dngos grub kyi thabs kyi yan lag tu 'gyur ro zhes 'dir de ltar gsungs so zhes pa ni drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i snying po'i sngags la @304b sogs pa rnams kyis bzlas pa sngar byas pa ni dngos grub kyi thabs kyi yan lag tu 'gyur ro zhes 'dir de ltar gsungs so zhes pa ni drang ba'i don to //
translated: Thus, it is stated here.🔽This is the interpretable meaning explanation.

original: 'o na de ltar na rdo rje sems dpa'i kho na 'grub kyi /
analyzed: 'o na de ltar na rdo rje sems dpa'i kho na 'grub kyi /
translated: Well, if it is so, then only Vajrasattva is achieved,

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ni ma yin nam zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ni ma yin nam zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: but not Vairochana, etc.?

original: dang po zhes pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs grub par 'gyur ba'i rnal 'byor pa'i dbang po'i gtsug gi nor bus brtag par bya zhing bsgom par bya'o zhes pa rtag pa rnams ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa kun te /
analyzed: dang po zhes pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs grub par 'gyur ba'i rnal 'byor pa'i dbang po'i gtsug gi nor bus brtag par bya zhing bsgom par bya'o zhes pa rtag pa rnams ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa kun te /
translated: The first, the form of Vajradhara, is to be imagined and meditated upon by the yogin with the crest jewel of his senses.

original: de rnams kyi rtse mo mchog bla na med pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi rtse mo mchog bla na med pa ste /
translated: The supreme peak of those is unsurpassed.

original: skyed par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: skyed par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the producer and because it is the nature.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' kho na me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin ni gdul bya'i 'dod pa sna tshogs pa las sna tshogs shing bsam gyis mi khyab par spyod pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dpag tu med pa'i skur 'byung bar
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' kho na me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin ni gdul bya'i 'dod pa sna tshogs pa las sna tshogs shing bsam gyis mi khyab par spyod pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dpag tu med pa'i skur 'byung bar
translated: Vajrasattva alone, the nature of mirror-like and so forth, arises as the immeasurable bodies of Vairochana and so forth, with various inconceivable conduct for the various desires of those to be tamed.

original: 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to ;🔽/'o na rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams /
analyzed: 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to ; /'o na rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams /
translated: This is the meaning.

original: so sor rang nyid kyis 'khor los sgyur ba rnams su bshad pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: so sor rang nyid kyis 'khor los sgyur ba rnams su bshad pa ma yin nam /
translated: Well then, aren't Vairochana and so forth explained as the individual cakravartins?

original: de'i phyir de bsgom pa kho nas de 'grub po zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bsgom pa kho nas de 'grub po zhe na /
translated: Therefore, they are accomplished by meditating on them alone.

original: nges pa med de /
analyzed: nges pa med de /
translated: There is no certainty.

original: gang gi phyir 'dis kyang dang rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs gtso bor sems dpa'i cho gas kyang dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyi gzugs /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dis kyang dang rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs gtso bor sems dpa'i cho gas kyang dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyi gzugs /
translated: Because this also is the form of Vajrasattva, and the form of other tathagatas is also the form of Vajrasattva.

original: gtso bor bsgoms kyang /
analyzed: gtso bor bsgoms kyang /
translated: Although the principal one is meditated,

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bo'i rgyal ba rnams skye bas so //🔽de rnams kyang so sor stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bo'i rgyal ba rnams skye bas so // de rnams kyang so sor stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i /
translated: the victors whose essence is Vairocana and so forth are born.

original: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i rang bzhin rnams kho na ste /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i rang bzhin rnams kho na ste /
translated: Those are also each the nature of the vajra of the awakening mind of indivisible emptiness and compassion.

original: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad do zhes pa la sogs pa ni /🔽de dang de'i sku la dgos pa'i dbang las /
analyzed: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad do zhes pa la sogs pa ni / de dang de'i sku la dgos pa'i dbang las /
translated: The meaning of the statement “Vairocana is the nature of mirror-like wisdom” and so forth is as follows.

original: de dang de'i ye shes kyi gtso bo nyid du /
analyzed: de dang de'i ye shes kyi gtso bo nyid du /
translated: The intention is that the principal ones of those and those wisdoms are stated to be the need for those and those bodies.

original: brjod par 'dod pas so zhes dgongs pa'o zhes pa drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pas so zhes dgongs pa'o zhes pa drang ba'i don to //
translated: This is the interpretable meaning explanation.
